While I prefer the shredded mulch from another vendor because it has smaller pieces, that brand had massive amounts of little splinters which made working with it by hand a pain, literally. This product, from the bags I received here in San Diego, was clean (no cactus, palm fronds, municipal waste, etc.) flat wood chips. Also, I grew up on a tree farm in NH, so it was nice to see that these chips really were hardwood, which means they won't break down quite as fast as the softwood mulches do.
reviews.author: YardWarrior

reviews.text: I will never buy this product again. Several of the bags had mold and some had large rocks and, weirdest of all, is that the mulch  is sprayed with some colorant that drips out of the bag and the mulch looks painted which it is. It is very strange stuff.
reviews.author: AP

reviews.title: "worst mulch ever"
reviews.text: moldy, with nails, plastics, and commercial wood chunks. Do not buy. Fades quickly too.
reviews.author: Angela

reviews.title: "If The Price Is Right"
reviews.text: 5 bags for $10 was a nice sale, but now the same mulch is on "Sale" for $2.50 per bag & advertised as a 31% savings rom a "regular" price of $3.66 per bag. I have NEVER seen Premium Brown/Black/Red mulch actually selling at that "normal" price. My opinion is that, with merely a 44% Recommended Rating by a whopping 830 plus purchasers, the quality of this mulch is only acceptable at the 5 for $10 price point.
reviews.author: Henry

reviews.title: "Stayed Black 3 days"
reviews.text: Put it down Sunday, color faded Wednesday.
reviews.author: Angus

reviews.title: "Will Never Buy Again"
reviews.text: Huge pieces of wood with lots of shredded plastic in multiple colors and even mold.  Felt like I should be wearinga mask to avoid the mold spores.  If I wasn't so desperate to get the job done I would have returned it but wouldnever buy again.
reviews.author: deedee

reviews.title: "Trash"
reviews.text: Just let me say that over the years I have bought a lot of mulch from Lowe's and been very satisfied with the product. But today I purchased this brown mulch which is very black.Allmost all of the mulch was ground up construction debris with a few painted pieces in bags.This should not be called mulch.It is just trash and needs to go to the land fill.Do not waste your money on this even if it is on sale.
reviews.author: Toney

reviews.title: "mold?"
reviews.text: several bags in the 30 I bought at white mold.  Very disappointed!
reviews.author: scott

reviews.title: "Color Variation"
reviews.text: Bought 60 bags of dark brown, about half appeared to have redish color which made it more of a light brown, the other half was dark brown. All bags were labeled brown.
reviews.author: Roy

reviews.title: "Looked fine, then the weeds grew"
reviews.text: The initial quality of the mulch was fine, looked black, didn't have garbage in it. However,  a week after putting it down, weeds started growing that I've never seen in my garden before. I have to pull them every 3 days. I don't want to spray weed killer as it's all in my nice flowers. I might as well kept it how it was rather than use this mulch! Stay away!
reviews.author: Jon

reviews.title: "Smells horrible, not a good quality"
reviews.text: We have used this mulch for years but this year it smells like manure, bugs were flying around it then next day after we spread it.  I got 18 bags and now my yard smells horrible.  I should bring my receipt back and get my money back.
reviews.author: Sunny1313

reviews.title: "Good Mulch"
reviews.text: Bought 10 bags at local Burlington NC store and I found no issues with trash , mold , mildew etc . Only a few larger chips as most of the mulch was medium to fine . Love the brown color . Great value during spring black Friday sale .
reviews.author: Bulllaked

reviews.title: "Must dry in sun before rain"
reviews.text: To everyone who complains the color washes away the first time it rains: you must be sure it bakes in the sun a few days before it rains.  Its definitely cheap mulch, but this same advice goes for any colored mulch you buy in a bag.
reviews.author: Josh

reviews.title: "ALL 11 BAGS OF MULCH MOLDED!"
reviews.text: I purchased 11 bags of this mulch Lowe's Bardstown, Ky 2 days ago and promptly prepared to put it down. When I opened the first bag and started pouring it out, the mulch was covered in a white/ silvery powder mold.I checked the other bags and you could see the mold thru the bags. Now I have to load the bags back on the truck and return them. If you buy any of this mulch you better check it carefully.
reviews.author: Tori

reviews.title: "Worst Mulch Ever"
reviews.text: In the past, I've purchased dyed mulch in bags because I was impressed with the longevity of the color. I purchased roughly 50 bags this year to start my spring cleanup and I've already noticed how faded the color is in the areas I've mulched. I need more mulch, but I'm hesitant to purchase anymore of this. Guess I'll have to order bulk or try a competitor store because this is the worst mulch ever...
reviews.author: Cmore

reviews.title: "Immediate Color Fade...No 12 Month Color Guarantee"
reviews.text: Color faded from black to grey in one day. Not worth the time, money or effort. Would not recommend or buy again. A disclaimer should be written on bag stating color may fade after rain...false advertising with 12 Month Color Guarantee.
reviews.author: Maggie

reviews.title: "Shredded trash mixed inside of bag"
reviews.text: Bought a bunch of bags and when I opened them there was shredded pieces of plastic in the bags mixed in with the mulch. The were what looked to be foam make up dabbers also mixed in. I never expected that and was very disappointed.
reviews.author: Tim

reviews.title: "not worth trouble"
reviews.text: I've been buying this mulch for 9 years and didn't have any problems until this year. I have nicer grass growing in my mulch then I do my yard.. I thought maybe it was a bag or 2, but it seems the 20 bags are the same. I bought some of a different color for my work building and ended up with the same nice grass in my flower bed... very disappointed this year in this product...
reviews.author: tamster

reviews.title: "Not buying this again"
reviews.text: Purchased 32 bags on 3/2/19 and it was full of all sorts of debris.  Rope, a plastic baby doll head, track.  Plus the actual mulch was not fully shred.  It had stick size pieces.  2 weeks ago I finished another project in the backyard and had to buy mulch (neither HD or Lowes was on sale)  I purchased the vigoro at HD and it is now noticeable how much high quality it was than the lowes.  Sorry.  Just a warning.  The mulch is already down so returning is not an option but not buying this again.  disapointed.
reviews.author: dave

reviews.title: "Worse ever mulch that I have purchased."
reviews.text: It smells so awful I had to pay someone to pul the carpet out of my trunk and wash it. It still smells, can't get rid of thisawful smell. The color is not brown even though it says brown. It is disgusting black. How could lowes sell such poor quality product. Please please don't buy it, you will regret it. My disappointment isbeyond words. This smelly mulch has ruined my beautiful flower beds.
reviews.author: Behi

reviews.title: "Good Stuff..!!"
reviews.text: Purchased this mulch as it was on sale.  Was I surprised at the quality, spreadability, less tracking and great color.  Really good stuff..!!  Going back for more (I have a lot of landscaping) this Labor Day Weekend.
reviews.author: Dolly

reviews.title: "Don't buy this unless it's really really cheap."
reviews.text: Bought three bags of this because I didn't want to go to the orange store and buy some scotts mulch.  Big mistake.  The sizes of this range from branches that are about 3/4" in diameter to chips (ok) with about half the bag being toothpick sized shreds of stuff, not chips.  I've never seen so much shreddy stuff in my life.  I need to buy more bags of mulch and will head to the competition to buy their stuff.  Also, one of the bags was really really wet inside, granted it has dried out being on the lawn.
reviews.author: Joe

reviews.title: "Nice Value / Product"
reviews.text: This year the mulch was great, the product looked triple shredded, no mold or large chunks and great color.  I guess our Nicholasville KY store received a good batch this year, Will buy again next year.
reviews.author: eking

reviews.title: "good color clean mulch"
reviews.text: I have bought this mulch about five different times probably a total of 60 bags it's always been clean good color and it's been down about a year and a half and color still pretty good would recommend highly
reviews.author: jim

reviews.title: "Not bark mulch"
reviews.text: This product is bark chips not what I would call bark mulch.  It was so ugly that the bag I opened I ran through a chipper to make it usable, still ugly. Taking the nine bags I have left back.
reviews.author: HDJ

reviews.title: "Get what you pay for"
reviews.text: Big chunks of wood 2x4 i think from chopped up pallets . Not ground up well and color does not last. A waist of money and labor since you will have to do it over if you want it to look good
reviews.author: Byrnzy

reviews.title: "terrible color bleed"
reviews.text: My hands look like I got done playing with a black ink pad. The color immediately rubbed off on everything. I cannot tell if the mulch is wet or saturated with dye, regardless it's a mess.
reviews.author: Jessica

reviews.title: "Colors fade after rain"
reviews.text: Bought 8 bags, wish I had read these review.  Laid down 4 bags,  A week later the black was nearly gone.  Great price, but not worth it if you don't get the look you wan.  I raked last years mulch up and got more color.  It says "guaranteed"  but no info on the Old Castle website.  Now another run back to Lowes.  Then on to the local hardware for the good stuff I bought last year
reviews.author: NH

reviews.title: "great mulch"
reviews.text: bought over 1200 bags of this on sale for $2.00 a bag. This is great STUFF. Nice and shredded and easy to spread. Waiting for it to go on sale again to buy another 200 bags
reviews.author: cal

reviews.title: "no problems here!"
reviews.text: Reading these other reviews, I'm surprised by the quality control issues. Here in Chicagoland, this mulch is pretty solid. I've been using it in my front yard for the past four years and I've never found anything objectionable, except for a bit of white fungus inside a bag that was left wet (once dried out and exposed to air, the fungus went away). Usually, I get clear bags that are dry or that have been stored with protection from the elements. I'm guessing if you buy a large quantity (I only get 6-10 cu ft), you're getting stuff brought in from a warehouse instead of what they display in-store. So I guess my advice is buy bags that you've inspected in the store; if you need a larger quantity shipped, use another source. As for color, this does fade to gray after a few months, but that's part of the natural process of organic material breaking down. If you want something that will keep its color, use rubber.
reviews.author: moi

reviews.title: "junk mulch"
reviews.text: I have used this mulch in the past and it was good . Not this year. It is full of big sticks and junk.I had one over two feet long. I will find my mulch some where else.
reviews.author: t-roy

reviews.title: "Stinks to High Heaven and back"
reviews.text: I purchased 5 bags of the brown mulch.  I cannot believe the terrible odor emitted from this mulch.  It is smelling up my yard and the neighbors.  I will have to remove and lay down some nice cedar and hope that the remaining brown mulch stench will dissipate.  Bag says it is natural forest product...from Manure forest maybe...or some other awful substance.  Hard to describe but the odor is awful and not worth the sale price of $2/bag.  The only positive I will give it is it is a rich brown color.
reviews.author: bungalowhaven

reviews.title: "Best ever"
reviews.text: I purchased 10 bags 1 year ago and still the color remains through all of the Seattle rain we get here. Labor Day sale now 4 for $10.00. New landscape area need more!
reviews.author: Mimi

reviews.title: "Amazing"
reviews.text: This is the best mulch I have ever purchased. The color is amazing, nice and thick, not shredded into bits, just perfect. I bought about 50 bags color consistent
reviews.author: Cherylfox

reviews.title: "Worst Smell Ever"
reviews.text: The mulch smells like feces. I put down 60 bags of mulch in my back yard and I can not enjoy sitting on my back deck because of the terrible odor; My back yard smells like it is located at a zoo, near the animal cages that need to be cleaned. What ever is in the mulch is attracting flies.
reviews.author: James

reviews.title: "To Bad"
reviews.text: This Mulch used to be great! I have been getting it for the last 2 years. This year it is awful!!! The color is inconsistent and the chips are huge like big sticks.
reviews.author: Kel

reviews.title: "Worst purchase of the summer"
reviews.text: IMHO, this product appears to be scrap lumber from the dump that has been shredded and stained. I have found bits of tarp, insulation, cigarettes, tape and other assorted trash...in....every.....bag. Unfortunately, my dear husband was kind enough to bring home 50 of bags of this "mulch." The color also fades quickly.
reviews.author: SadGardener

reviews.title: "Absolute TRASH"
reviews.text: I would give this mulch a ZERO if it were an option. We wanted to save some money by tackling our beds ourselves this year so we bought 40 bags of this garbage, which in turn will cost us more next year when we have to have it all pulled back out! Among the giant sticks the bags contained lots of plastic, rocks, wire, and tons of mildew. NEVER buying this junk again!
reviews.author: Mossmom

reviews.title: "Absolute TRASH"
reviews.text: I would give this mulch a ZERO if it were an option. We wanted to save some money by tackling our beds ourselves this year so we bought 40 bags of this garbage, which in turn will cost us more next year when we have to have it all pulled back out! Among the giant sticks the bags contained lots of plastic, rocks, wire, and tons of mildew. NEVER buying this junk again!
reviews.author: Mossmom

reviews.title: "Worst mulch ever in May 2017"
reviews.text: Use to be decent in recent years but this year every bag of this "Premium" brown mulch was terrible.  White fungus, huge chunks of debris, some lighter color than other bags.  Also, some bags appeared to be double grinded (very fine) while others were very stringy.  No consistency.  Had to redo all the areas I had spread this mulch.  From Lowe's in Ballwin Missouri.
reviews.author: unhappy

reviews.title: "Excellent"
reviews.text: I purchased 80 bags when on sale, zero bugs and only saw couple small pieces of trash in only 5 bags, 2 bags had white fungus/mold?, good mulch!
reviews.author: Scott

reviews.title: "Buyer BEWARE!   Termites White Mold Trash in bags"
reviews.text: Lowe's hardwood mulch used to be very good with a consistent texture and color. I landscape for others and recommended it to family and friends, and used it in my yard. The last 3 purchases this season were garbage. From the same pallets, the bags had either a large chunky texture or a finer grinded texture, a real mess when both were spread in the same area. Subterranean termites in some bags.  Some soaked with water, very heavy to handle while other bags were dry. White string mold in some bags. Rocks, plastic bag scraps, wood pieces with blue paint on them. The color fades quickly unlike the very durable colored mulch that Lowe's used to sell for several years. Very disappointed. I always promote Lowe's over the orange box and the place with the helpful hardware man. I'm doing a job this weekend and I'll look carefully at the Lowe's garbage mulch first, I suspect I'll buy across the street where Vigoro is the same price.
reviews.author: Alan

reviews.title: "So far so good"
reviews.text: Bought and distributed 17 bags in gardens and around trees. No trash in bags whatsoever. Rain coming so will know after that if color remains or if mulch floats.Wear old garden clothes while working with this stuff as it turns everything it touches black. As other reviews have correctly stated, it is not a super fine grind. It did however, fill the ticket for my yard at a reasonable cost and so far looks lovely.
reviews.author: HB

reviews.title: "Good mulch, just not as colorfast as advertised"
reviews.text: I've bought about 24 bags of this mulch over the past year. It's a good mulch without too much "waste" in it. However, my only complaint is with the black color. It doesn't seem to be as durable in sunlight. The areas I use it (around my large porch) receive direct afternoon sun. The black has faded to a dull gray after only about 6 months. If I had it to do over again, I would choose a brown or red mulch instead, as I think they don't fade nearly as quickly judging by my neighbors' lawns.
reviews.author: Brandon

reviews.title: "Color Fades Quickly"
reviews.text: If you're looking for just any old mulch, get this one. The color fades extremely quickly. The photo below is mulch placed one day apart. If you just need some mulch, it's a great deal. If you want something that holds color, look elsewhere.
reviews.author: Jimbo

reviews.title: "Premium black wood mulch"
reviews.text: This stuff is trash. Has rocks, boards up to 6 inches long and 2 inches wide. Does that sound like premium mulch ???
reviews.author: tso2296

reviews.title: "1st Rain and Color Faded to Brown!!"
reviews.text: Bought this much because was on sale for $2 a bag. Well looked great first day and then that night came the rain....sad to say...the dye completely ran off of this mulch. the majority of the much now looked brown. extremly disappointing when you spead 30 bags of this stuff just to have it fade the next day due to rain. I would suggest trying other brand.
reviews.author: jbergeron

reviews.title: "Not all the same type of mulch"
reviews.text: I was finishing up a mulching project at home and needed 12 more bags.  I've bought this particular type of mulch in past seasons and had already purchased a number of bags this year.  Of the 12 bags I purchased yesterday, 2 were not the expected shredded hardwood mulch.  They appeared to consist of shredded pine bark chips, which I didn't realize until I had dumped the bags in my flower bed.  I guess I shouldn't expect "Premium Hardwood Mulch" to be premium or hardwood when it's on sale!
reviews.author: TNBill

reviews.title: "Great for weeds"
reviews.text: Applied last summer and by far best mulch I have ever used kept it's color and controlled weeds very well will buy again.
reviews.author: Missy

reviews.title: "Love This Mulch"
reviews.text: I have used this specific mulch in bulk in both dark brown and black a few times and love it. I've never had issues with bugs or smell or any other issues. I particularly like the dark brown, it does hold color well and looks so fresh. I had to leave 14 bags in my SUV for a week due to weather, and my SUV smells fresh and lightly cedar-like! I love it.
reviews.author: Tina

reviews.title: "Garbage full of trash."
reviews.text: If it was free I would never use it again.  It's just junk filled with all kinds of trash, junk, and mold.
reviews.author: Hendy

reviews.title: "Picky reviews"
reviews.text: I love the look of this mulch in my flower beds. Unlike other reviews, I have not found a bunch of garbage in it nor does it lose it's color quickly. As far as I'm concerned, for the money that I pay for it (get it when it's on sale during the holiday weekends), it's one heck of a deal!!!! I will keep going back and getting more!
reviews.author: Louise

reviews.title: "Works well for my application"
reviews.text: Not sure why all the negative reviews.  I used this as part of a landscaped fire pit area in my back yard.  The color has held up well, but that's not to say it looks as good as it did on day 1, which was 2 years ago.  Buy it, but wait for it to go on sale.  Four stars for a few suspect pieces in a couple of bags.  Other than that, solid product.
reviews.author: Melissa

reviews.text: It's a little more of a dark grey to black color only wish it was darker but other wise great product
reviews.author: Lety

reviews.title: "bugs and mold"
reviews.text: I purchased this product a couple of times and it was good enough for the $2/bag sale price.  The last time I bought it, the bags were soggy with big patches of mold inside it. Two of the bags had ant colonies, complete with eggs. At least I learned what "shotgun mold" is.  Suspect the stores just leave it sit out in the rain for months on end.
reviews.author: Doug

reviews.title: "Don't waste your money"
reviews.text: These were basically just bags of mold and trash. Maybe one of of twenty wasnt complete garbage
reviews.author: Guy

reviews.title: "Premium 2-cu ft Black Hardwood Mulch"
reviews.text: We have used this mulch numerous times. It's easy to spread and the color doesn't fade. Lowe's makes the process so easy. I ordered and paid it online. I immediately received an email that my order was being processed and shortly after that I received an email that my order was ready for pick up. I went to the internet order counter of Lowe's. I was give a copy of the order, drove to the area where the mulch was stacked and had staff load the bags into my vehicle. Lowe's is the best.
reviews.author: HRKC

reviews.title: "great price"
reviews.text: Great quailty product and very reasonablilty priced.  Would certainly recommend.
reviews.author: Bluestreak426

reviews.title: "looks better than I imagined"
reviews.text: I have used the red mulch around my house plantings, but this was especially for my loquats, cherry tree, azaleas, other flowers and small vegetable garden.  This is in one garden at the front of my house, and it looks very attractive.  So easy to handle, looks more like dirt for the vegetables than the other colors which to me look artificial.  The moisture content was good and the quality was outstanding.  This is the first time I have used brown and I am very pleased with the results. Idefinitely will be using it again as the need arises.
reviews.author: Marilyn

reviews.title: "Waste"
reviews.text: One week later doesn't look any different than a yr old mulch. Don't waste your money
reviews.author: Tina

reviews.title: "Looks great, works great,"
reviews.text: Put about 500 bags in my back yard. It looks great and my fruit trees only need water every 3 days instead of every day during the hot Las vegas summer.  I highly recommend this product it helps to retain moisture on the ground and helps the backyard stay a little bit cooler.
reviews.author: John

reviews.title: "Beautiful Bed"
reviews.text: Premium Brown Mulch looks great on our flower bed. Live south of Mesa AZ hardly any rain year round. Our flower bed get early sunshine only. Mulch should last well over the year guaranteed colorwise. Good price.
reviews.author: Joey

reviews.title: "Hit and miss"
reviews.text:
This is now my fourth year buying this mulch and for the most part I was very happy with it up till this year. Previously the biggest complaint would be that the color and texture didn't match from batch to batch but that was easy enough to determine by looking at the bag. What you can't see if the amount of trash in these bags. Previous years I would find an occasional piece of plastic but nothing terrible, this year I was constantly finding nails, crushed aluminum, green metal straps, plastic etc. It wasn't uncommon to find more than I could hold in my hands per bag and I have big hands. So while these are easier to move around than the bulk delivery method I lost all that time to picking through my flower beds to pull this garbage out. Not to mention I am now worried I may have missed a nail and someone might step on it. The final straw for me was that several bags had mold growing inside. When I flipped the bag over the entire bottom was mold, so they got dumped in the woods. Guess I will be trying the HD version for my remaining 50+ bags.

But with that said my buddy just said the 50 bags he got were relatively clean so maybe this is batch dependent. Either way I think I will try something different.
reviews.author: wlepse

reviews.title: "garbage"
reviews.text: Losing color after two weeks. Full of weed seeds. Awful!
reviews.author: Paul

reviews.title: "Ok on a budget"
reviews.text: Soooo.....I have bought 15 bags of this mulch. I have used them in phases over this spring. I laid 10 bags down and then followed up with 5 to refresh. It looks really nice the first couple of months but it does fade. There are foreign materials. I have found several rusted nails. Its cheap. What do you expect? If you have a small area to mulch that won't be walked on it's not too bad.  If you're looking to mulch a large area that people may walk on...avoid avoid avoid.  #tetanus
reviews.author: Parrothead77

reviews.title: "Not chipped well"
reviews.text: The mulch this year was full of huge twigs! Very disappointed!
reviews.author: I

reviews.title: "only buy if you don't care too much"
reviews.text: We bought 10 bags of this last year, and it was decent looking. Nice brown color, chips or bark, not shredded. Absolutely impressed with it.This year, however, i bought an additional 25-30 bags total. I have made several trips, because I have never mulched this particular area of my yard, and it is a very large area. Each trip I opened bags that were different than the last. EVERY bag was different and each purchase I make it becomes more shredded than the last.I am now laying mutilated pieces of super white, molded bags, mixed with bags that are moistened nicely with rich color (some are reddish looking and some are dark brown - NONE match each other!)So confused on how they actually make this product because of how significantly different each bag is. My recommendation is if you are simply adding curb appeal while selling your house like we are, it's worth it. If you genuinely care about your landscape and want to make your neighbors jealous, get something with better reviews!
reviews.author: Porsha

reviews.title: "The smell!"
reviews.text: Purchased numerous bags to add another layer to our existing mulch that has been down a while. The smell was horrendous on the drive home but I thought maybe it would dissipate when the bags were opened and spread out. Not the case although it has got a little better after a day and I only hope that it disappears altogether over time as I have another order to pick up. I can't comment on color fade as yet although other reviewers have had this problem but it will be interesting to see how it compares to the Scott's I have in another area of of the yard which has not changed color in 12 months. I didn't come across any metal, nails etc as some other purchasers have, and no obvious signs of insects so far. Cheap price (5 bags for $10) but I would not call this premium mulch by any stretch of the imagination.
reviews.author: Lunagal

reviews.title: "Premium Mulch? Loaded with Spiders!!!"
reviews.text: I bought 12 bags to do an area in my front yard. I dumped all the bags and then bent over to spread the mulch. There were spiders and spider eggs everywhere...thousands of them!!! Lowe's hit a new low selling this garbage! I'm done buying anything from them.
reviews.author: sophie

reviews.title: "Mulch at Whitehall PA store"
reviews.text: The mulch at the Whitehall PA store is a disgrace.  Nothing is done to keep the bags from getting water logged.  I picked up bags yesterday and one weighed almost 60 pounds.  Of course no one is available to help senior citizens load.  I loaded over 20 bags myself even though I am 72 years old.  I also had to help a man who was 86, an elderly woman and another elderly man.  When I picked some up last week and asked for help I was told no one is available even though there are people in the store.  If the mulch was taken care of it wouldn't been a problem.  It's tough to spread mulch that is in wet chunks and dripping with water.  Lowes calls it premium mulch which when dry is nice if you ignore the white mold and a few rocks.  I'll enter the drawing below so maybe I can get something for the back breaking work.
reviews.author: John

reviews.title: "Unhappy"
reviews.text: Color faded fast,  now looks clay colored. Don't buy!
reviews.author: Mel

reviews.title: "Premium-are you kidding?"
reviews.text: I foolishly bought three bags of the stuff. They are bags of ground up pallets. There were sticks 6" long in the mix along with other chunks of wood. I do not know how they could call this premium. I am going scrap it back up and throw into the woods. It would take years to break down for anything useful. Save your money!
reviews.author: Unhappy

reviews.title: "ABSOLUTE GARBAGE"
reviews.text: I purchased sixty bags of this hardwood mulch because it's almost impossible to find good shredded pine bark mulch. This mulch is garbage. The color of the mulch in all the bags seems to be consistent but then again, the mold or fungus in all the bags is also consistent.Stay away from this mulch. You'll be glad you did.
reviews.author: Sichuan

reviews.title: "Premium mulch brown"
reviews.text: Just bought 20 bags 3/31/19 this is the worst mulch I've ever seen. You can get better at a landfill that's free, this has very large pieces of wood in it. There was even pieces of rags , paper, metal, styrofoam, I have brought this brand before last year and it wasn't as bad as this year. I'll never get mulch here again.
reviews.author: Frank

reviews.title: "Overwhelming manure stench & poor quality"
reviews.text: I purchased 32 bags of the dark brown mulch and agree with other reviews that there are pieces of painted wood in some bags along with white mold. The absolute worse thing is the overpowering smell of manure, which permeates everything and has drawn bunches of flies. My car smells like a barn housing cows & pigs. I can't open up the windows in my house due to the overwhelming stench. I purchased the same mulch last year and didn't have this problem. I very unhappy!
reviews.author: She

reviews.title: "Termites and Large chunks of wood  YUCK!!!!"
reviews.text: I bought 14 bags... put them all around my flower beds and noticed a couple large black ants (come to find out they were termites!!) eeekkkkk yuck!!!  Also there were Alot of chunks that were the size of a block of cheese.    It looked real good till I came across these issues. I am hoping they don't go to my house.    So disgusted and disappointed. I wish I would have read the reviews BEFORE buying this..I am going to call Lowes now.
reviews.author: Upset

reviews.title: "Worse Than What I Replaced"
reviews.text: I purchased 16 bags from the Jefferson City location on 4/27/2019.  As always, I removed some of the old mulch to maintain the same depth. The first couple bags were just ok in color. The next several had so much mold that I decided not to use in the flower beds visible from the street. The quality of the new mulch was much worse than the year old mulch I previously removed. Imagine my disappointment. I will never purchase this brand again. Buyer beware, complete garbage!
reviews.author: KGS

reviews.title: "You get what you pay for!"
reviews.text: Severe rain and humidy left mulch full of white mold. Never in twenty years had I had this experience. Never will go cheap again!
reviews.author: Dee

reviews.title: "Worst mulch ever"
reviews.text: I purchased 50 bags of the black mulch. I put it in my flower beds and 3 days later after a rain the color faded into a brownish color. Small green weeds began growing shortly after the rain. These weeds were not present when I spread the mulch. My landscaping definitely looked better prior to using the mulch.
reviews.author: Swebe

reviews.title: "TERMITES"
reviews.text: FILLED WITH TERMITES, FILLED WITH TRASH, SMELLS LIKE A SEWER.Lowe's ended up getting us a very expensive termite treatment because we had such a terrible experience with this product. I will never purchase mulch from Lowe's again.

reviews.title: "Great purchase at a great price!"
reviews.text: I bought 20 bags of Premium Brown Mulch when they were on sale for 5 for $10. You might think they were on sale because they were inferior, but I saw a 10 wheeler parked in the back of Lowe's filled with this product so I figured it was selling quickly. This is the first time I've used this product and I love it. The brown color highlights the greens and flowers beautifully. After a LOT of rain, the color has stayed a rich chocolate brown. I have previously had a problem with mulch washing away during a storm, but this mulch says put! I'm buying more just for this fact alone! Out of the 20 bags, I had NO insect problems at all. I have learned, in my 21 years here in Venice, not to put any mulch around the perimeter of my house, especially not mulch. I only use Lowe's rocks there. I give Lowe's and this mulch an A++.
reviews.author: Roni

reviews.title: "the Disastor"
reviews.text: I purchased 20 bags of Lowe's Premium Black Mulch on 6/27/17.  It is the w-o-r-s-t mulch I have ever used.  Each bag contained an abundance of BLUE mulch chips and there were cut up wire, like electrical wire, throughout the mulch.  Since I had purchased 20 bags I was not interested in having to load it back up in my car to return, so I went ahead and put it all down and I needed to finish my landscape project at that time.  I might add that another reason I would not have loaded it back in to my car to return is because when I bought it the bags were all wet.  Lowe's employees did help load it in to my car, but were very careless.  Upon returning home and removing the mulch from my car, there were a number of spots on the ceiling and interior of my car where the wet mulch had come in to contact and left black stains.  Now, only a little over a month later, the mulch has lost all of it's color - and there are even chips that are blond colored so all the mulch looks "freckled," and definitely NOT black even though the color is supposed to last for 12 months.   PLUS, as the mulch has gotten wet and faded, it has "bled" on to my shrubs and plants and most of them are either dead or dying from the dyes in the mulch.   I would like to contact Lowe's to learn how to at least get a refund on this really nasty product.  Thanks.
reviews.author: LB

reviews.title: "mulch supposedly premium"
reviews.text: If you are considering this mulch.  I have put down about 300 bags it is the worst looking crap.  It has major big sticks in it the color after few rains looks very bad.  And they call this premium?  Never buy again!
reviews.author: jams

reviews.title: "This mulch is not MSC certified"
reviews.text: Given that their seal of approval is not on the packaging, this mulch is not certified by the Mulch and Soil Council (MSC) - this means it could contain construction debris including pressure-treated wood which contains toxic chemicals such as arsenic. It looks nice, but environmentally it is not a good choice and I certainly would not use it around edible plants.
reviews.author: BenSheats

reviews.title: "Terrible - Color Fades with One Rain"
reviews.text: I purchased 25 bags of this mulch (brown) because it was on sale for $2/bag. I put the mulch down around 2PM and around 6PM we had a heavy, soaking rain. The next morning the mulch I had put down was completely faded out, honestly my old mulch looked better. Do not waste your money. The bag reads that the color is "guaranteed for 12 months" - more like 12 hours.
reviews.author: FCBCT

reviews.title: "It is what you'd expect"
reviews.text: This mulch has been down in my yard for two weeks with a few thunderstorms. The intense dark color has faded slightly, but returns when dampened. There were a few bags with large sticks and a few with tiny pieces, but mostly the mulch is great, regular mulch. It has stayed in place well.
reviews.author: NewGardener

reviews.title: "Black Premium Mulch"
reviews.text: As always, Lowe's is a very retailer for home improvement products. Purchase 120 bags and had them deliver. Delivery was prompt, driver was courteous, and friendly. Rain helped to soak the mulch prior to spreading and since it was wet, it stayed in place. There have been no color bleed, very, very, little debris in bags which is a huge plus of locally procured products and has dramatically improved the appearance of gardens and foundation beds. Will be purchasing more and replenishing as the product starts to age. Very happy with the product and Lowe's as a vendor.
reviews.author: jiggy955

reviews.title: "Not just Mulch."
reviews.text: I found Styrofoam and a lot of Pallet pieces along with nails in several bags...
reviews.author: Ken

reviews.title: "Not mulch"
reviews.text: I bought 4 bags to re mulch around a tree in my front yard. It was nothing like the mulch I bought last year. It is more like colored wood chunks with a mixture of softball size "dirt" ??? balls. Sure glad I did not buy enough to do all my flower beds or they would have been returned.
reviews.author: Stan

reviews.title: "good mulch"
reviews.text: found what was left of a small belt in mulch....the wire....no big deal....happened to read on bag....ponderosa pine....don`t know about ponderosa pine...all pines i know of are not hardwood though...
reviews.author: thequestioner

reviews.title: "Spend your $$ on a better mulch than this"
reviews.text: It was relatively inexpensive, so I thought I'd try it.  My bags were clearly full of wood from pallets that had been run through a chipper.....and poorly so, at that.  Garbage and insects abounded.  Buy a better mulch product.  This stuff is just ugly.
reviews.author: ScubaRW4

reviews.title: "Treated 2 x 4 s, plastic bags & plywood?"
reviews.text: Bags of garbage and big chunks of recycled construction materials. Not what you want to be putting in your garden. Also grows lots of annoying mushroom/fungus. Wont make this mistake again.
reviews.author: Snodevil

reviews.title: "Mucho Mediocre Mulch"
reviews.text: I bought a couple of dozens bags of this on sale.  If it were anything other $2 a bag, this review would have been 1 star.  About 50% of the bags were ok, normal, fairly well ground mulch.  The other 50% were apparently the remnants of pallets, or furniture or buildings or something.  There were very large chunks of wood blocks that made the mulch, at best, silly looking and at worst almost unusable.  I'll do my bargain mulch shopping elsewhere next Spring.
reviews.author: Mulchy

reviews.title: "Bad Quality - Garbage"
reviews.text: Been using this mulch for at least 3 years with great results. Bought 40 bags this year and it is horrible, color is completely washed out after only one rain. Very angry and disappointed.
reviews.author: Blitz917

reviews.title: "Would never buy this product again!"
reviews.text: Generally, my husband and I purchase mulch from a local family owned business and have if delivered to our driveway. Unfortunately, we were unable to get if hand weekend we wanted to do it so we decided to take advantage of Lowe's 5 for $10 Memorial Weekend special. I'm not sure if I've ever been so upset for disappointed in a product that I was in this Mulch. While I understand that this product was on sale, I by no means thought it was going to be up to the quality of our local hometown store, but had I know the garbage I was going to have to pick out of if I never would have wasted money on 28 bags. When I say I picked garbage out of this mulch I mean exactly ghost. Ever single bag had a variety of garbage in it that I had to pick out. The garbage included garbage bag pieces, random pieces of plastic ranging from 1" to about 5" across, twisty ties, a large piece of frayed rope about 6" long, random pieces of metal, and my favorite part, a large piece of a Red Bull can, large enough I could still read what it was. I can't believe a company like this would put this awful excuse for "premium mulch" out on their floor. Oh and did I mention the smell? Yep, it smelled completely like manure, not at all like mulch. Moral of the story, don't buy what's on sale ever, and stick with actual mulch from your hometown store, paying twice as much is completely worth it in this case.
reviews.author: Beth

reviews.title: "mulch madness"
reviews.text: Don't believe all the negative reviews.  For the on-sale price this mulch is really good. Uniform in color, no trash, no mold in bag.  Other than a few larger pieces of wood, I really  liked this mulch.  Bought 10 bags on sale to put in flower beds.  Spread real easy.  I can recommend this mulch even though I was skeptical because of negative reviews.
reviews.author: madmulcher

reviews.title: "Best Mulch Purchased Ever!"
reviews.text: I bought 90 bags of the black mulch for our property. I was apprehensive because of some reviews, but decided to take the chance. I am so happy I did! Mulch was EXCELLENT quality. None of the large particles or trash was present that was mentioned in other reviews. I bought 90 bags, and all were same high-quality mulch, same consistency, and spread easily. I would buy this product again in a heartbeat. Definitely would recommend this product. Looks GREAT!
reviews.author: Diane

reviews.title: "Bag of trash/debris"
reviews.text: I buy this year after year abd 25-30 bags. It's cheap so you can't expect much, obviously color will dade. But when you buy landscaping mulch you expect it to be usable. The majority of he bags were full of blocks of wood, 5-6â long, 3-4â wide, and 2â thick. Tons of pieces of what looked like cut up garden hoses, rusty nails, I just couldn't believe it. Who's going to try to re-bag all this crap and return it? Not me, but won't buy mulch from Lowes again
reviews.author: Tedward

reviews.title: "not the best but for $2 is worth it"
reviews.text: I got this on sale and got some with white stuff but it went away soon after.
reviews.author: Frisco

reviews.title: "Just Awful"
reviews.text: Don't waste your money.....I bought 6 bags of mulch to get them home to find out the mulch is moldy and diseased from sitting around....it looks like the mulch is 10 years old right out of the bag!!!!! Black mulch that's funny more like white and brown mold mulch!
reviews.author: TomD

reviews.title: "DISSAPOINTING"
reviews.text: I recently spread 50 bags of this mulch and I am disappointed in the consistency of it.  It is not like a typical mulch but rather a very shredded grassy product.  I will not purchase again because it doesn't blend with the regular brown mulch I purchase yearly.
reviews.author: LT

reviews.title: "plastic pieces & stones in mulch"
reviews.text: i purchased 10 bags to do some touch up, found  numerous pieces of plastic in the  mulch including a soda cap. They also had stones & large chunks of wood in the bags i had to remove.  This product claims to be premium, i would say premium junk !! Dont Buy !!
reviews.author: jay

reviews.title: "Great mulch!! ...Again, this year!"
reviews.text: I bought 10 bags of this particular mulch last week for my yard. I bought the same  mulch last year at Lowes for my yard. Both times the mulch has been great....nothing in the packages other than great looking dark wood colored mulch.  I like the way it is shredded because it stays down on the ground well.  Couldn't be happier. Thanks Lowes!
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "AWFUL"
reviews.text: Purchased 20 bags of mulch and found mold, large pieces of wood w no color at all, even glass shards in some of the bags!  Good thing I had gloves on.  Useless, after it rained all color has washed away.  VERY INFERIOR product.  It is CHEAP for a reason!
reviews.author: LJD123

reviews.title: "Rain leaches color"
reviews.text: Decent consistent shredding.  Color is now medium brown after one rain.  At least there was no mildew in any bags.You must get a fresh shipment (just arrived at store) and use quickly or you WILL get mildew in every bag....learnedthat lesson last year.
reviews.author: bob

reviews.title: "Not great"
reviews.text: I bought 80 bags of this mulch to establish new beds around my home.  I spread it all back in April 2018.  I did not see any color variation or bleeding issues other people talked about which is about the only positive (thought it was dry and did not rain for a while after putting it out).  However I did notice several issues.  First, the mulch is more like bark chips and is very light, it floats out of the beds all throughout the lawn very easily.  Second, it does not break down, the mulch and pieces don't look much different today than when it was spread.  Third, there was a lot of trash in the bags, metal and plastic it looked like.  This stuff was ok for what I needed which was a lot of bags cheap to make new beds, but here on out, I'll be getting higher quality mulch to maintain the beds.
reviews.author: Customer

reviews.title: "Faded w/in days!!!"
reviews.text: I bought 10 bags of this mulch and it was black when I poured it out but by the time it had been in the sun and dried, It is NOT black...its still mulch, just not the color I wanted.  I need another 20 bags and will buy them just so everything matches.
reviews.author: rlensing

reviews.title: "Premium 2 -cu ft Black harwood mulch"
reviews.text: Have always found this to be the best product, but...this year I was very disappointed. I always use the black. 24 hours after it was most certainly brown. Certainly wasn't my design plan to go with. Yuk!!!
reviews.author: Eloc

reviews.title: "Beautiful color, rich looking."
reviews.text: I purchased five bags of the brown mulch...the color Is a deep rich brown. I've read other reviews and have had no problems that were noted. As for the person who bought the bags with termites, I have to say Lowe's is well known for their excellent customer service. I am getting ready to buy more bags and will certainly check them for termites...that's a nightmare waiting to happen. But I must say everything I purchased at Lowe's is great quality .
reviews.author: Orlie

reviews.title: "BONUS plastic, rocks, nails, wood blocks included"
reviews.text: You get what you pay for, but in this case you get so much more and not in a good way.  I bought 15 bags of mulch and everyone had pieces of shredded plastic, a few rocks/nails, and several large un-shredded (and usually painted) wood in each bag.
reviews.author: Gizmo91

reviews.title: "Worth every penny!"
reviews.text: At $2.00 per bag, how can you go wrong!  I purchased a few bags to use in an obscure location.  Was very surprised to find such a good quality for such a low price.  I went back to Lowes and bought 24 more bags for my flower beds.  Nicely shredded, no mold, no "junk" and consistent color throughout. My one negative comment would be the plastic bags were very thin and easily ripped while trying to transport to various locations throughout my yard.P
reviews.author: Patty

reviews.title: "Mulch is wet at the Hanover PA store"
reviews.text: I bought 60 bags over a two day period. About a third of it was extremely wet making it difficult to carry and spread.  Even the guys loading my truck at the store were complaining about the weight and how dirty their clothes were getting.  How can it get wet when its packaged in plastic?  Was it packaged wet by the manufacturer?  I would still recommend it because of the $2 retail.  Help the employees out by giving them aprons and gloves to wear.
reviews.author: WM

reviews.title: "Get what you pay for"
reviews.text: Product is barely worth the 5-for-10 sale price and I wouldn't consider touching it otherwise. More or less a bag of sticks mixed with dark soil, which is why the color seems to fade immediately when it starts drying out. I can't wait to see what it looks like once it rains. I didn't have any mold issues or foreign substances (only 1-2 pieces of plastic - part of a garden hose?? in 30 bags). It will have to do for this season since I already put it down and don't feel like digging the bags out of the trash to argue a refund. But next year I will go for a bulk delivery from an actual garden supplier, the bagged stuff at the big-box stores seems to be going more downhill every year. It's a shame because the stuff I bought from Lowe's at the end of the year last year was really good, but it wasn't this brand or even the one they had advertised at the time. They must have run out and substituted it but it was a much better product, the remnants on the ground through the winter still looked better than this product that I just covered it with.
reviews.author: ChrisVinMA

reviews.title: "Termites"
reviews.text: Bought 7 bags, one of them is full of underground termites. Now they are in my flowerbed, I can only pray the termite control stuff works on them. Cheap mulch ended up not being so cheap after all.
reviews.author: FSM

reviews.title: "Worth the money"
reviews.text: This mulch is a shredded hardwood dyed brown. It does have some larger pieces of wood in it but for the most part it is a good mulch. I have used it for several years and this is my observation.  Occasionally a bag might have some really large pieces.  The dye will run so do not place bags on driveway/walkways etc. When you purchase, it is a good idea to get the dry bags. My husband picked up 20 bags after a couple days of rain. with my Honda Odyssey, and it drained all over the carpet and was a huge mess.  About bugs, Yes I did open one bag and found termites. That is one out of maybe 500 or so bags. If we leave the bags sitting too long and they have been wet, you may get white mold. Spread the mulch within a couple of weeks to avoid a lot of problems. Lowe's is wonderful to work with so if you find your bags are moldy or buggy let them know. I would assume they were not very fresh when you bought them. Oh yes, and when spread around our boxwood the tips of the leaves had a brownish red color, but it is pretty. Do not spread around food plants.
reviews.author: Jodibar

reviews.title: "you get what you pay for"
reviews.text: 's cheap on sale but spending more might be better. Color does not last that long, maybe a month or two. Big chuncks of wood, pieces of plastic , not a lot of plastic but still junk. As for insects, may not come with them but seems to attract them in some areas. Also doesn't prevent weed growth. I'm think I'll spend a little more next time and see if I get some thing better. Not what I thought mulch would or should be. You get what you pay for.
reviews.author: BR

reviews.title: "LOAD THE STUFF YOURSELF!"
reviews.text: Bought 30 bags. when I started spreading, there were two different colors. went back with the bags that had the wrong "BROWN" and hand picked my own. If you flip the bags over to the back, you get a better representation of the contents.
reviews.author: Geezer

reviews.title: "Good Mulch"
reviews.text: Interesting all the varied reviews.  I have been using this mulch for the last couple of years and have had excellent results.  I have never seen any kind of critters in the mulch.  The dye does last at least a year, fading over time of course but even at a year, it still has some color to it.  I have just put down 160 bags and they have been very consistent, there have been a couple of big chunks but very minimal.  I will buy again next year.
reviews.author: Mark

reviews.title: "decent cheap mulch"
reviews.text: I live in an HOA, and they mulch the complex every other year or so. So for $20 I can have my place looking good. I have considered rubber mulch, but for $140 compared to $20 it is a no brainier. If I owned I would do the rubber mulch.
reviews.author: Ccg

reviews.title: "Has fiberglass"
reviews.text: Bought 18 bags of brown mulch and after loading it, starting etching all over like handling fiberglass.  It got really bad after all 18 bags were in the garden.Checked review and other customer had mention it contained fiberboard.
reviews.author: JKM

reviews.title: "40 bags, no problems"
reviews.text: I bought 40 bags of this mulch and the bags contained --mulch-- and nothing else.  Thus, it appears that the early quality issues with this product may be resolved.  When the mulch is on sale, it is nearly as cheap as bulk mulch.
reviews.author: Ronald

reviews.title: "Premium Black mulch"
reviews.text: Bought it on sell and got my military discount so mulch is ok but it rained the afternoon after I spread it out and then again the next day.It is no longer black. I recommended it only for being mulch not for color retention.
reviews.author: thunderbolt

reviews.title: "All 10 bags were full of gnats or small flies"
reviews.text: I spead this product in my landscaping around my front porch and rear patio and the gnats that we never had are so bad we no longer can enjoy our yard because of the pest that came free with the purchase of this mulch.
reviews.author: Anonymous

reviews.title: "Carpet of weeds!"
reviews.text: We weeded our bed and then added this mulch. We now have a crop of knee high weeds. Another area we mulched with a different batch is fine...the weeds only grew where I placed the bags of this product. Steer clear!
reviews.author: Catriot

reviews.title: "Excellent Product"
reviews.text: Outdated reviews should be removed.  I've used this brand 3 years running with consistent success.
reviews.author: Nrvmatc

reviews.title: "Nice Mulch"
reviews.text: I purchased this mulch figuring I'd give it a chance and when putting it down I found pieces of trash in it. I understand that the mulch is recycled and dyed but finding someone else's trash in the mulch is gross.
reviews.author: Austin

reviews.title: "White mold and rocks"
reviews.text: Bought 20 bags of the brown mulch. Stored in my dry vented shed. 12 out of the 20 had white mold and some had rocks in them. One bag had a 4 pound rock in it!
reviews.author: Lou

reviews.title: "Mulch full of rocks, nails and trash"
reviews.text: Bought this on sale and now know why it is so cheap. Every bag had either nails, trash or rocks in it. Found one dirt clod that was the size of a softball. Very poor quality.
reviews.author: Kman003

reviews.title: "Color doesn't stay"
reviews.text: I purchased about a dozen bags of this, put half down, went out of town for a few days, and the color had faded out. Put down the rest, rained the next day, same result. Didn't last a week, let alone a year.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "The brown mulch has been great for my garden"
reviews.text: I have used this mulch from Lowes for years. I always buy it when its on sale and get several bags. It is a nice dark brown color and does fade slightly over time but usually I have to buy more then anyway.
reviews.author: bonz

reviews.title: "Not worth it"
reviews.text: Color fades immediately and the texture is good.  Would rather pay a little more
reviews.author: JC

reviews.title: "Good quality, but definately not PREMIUM"
reviews.text: I bought 25 bags of this mulch when they had it on sale 5/10. Good price. EVERY bag had sticks in it, some sticks were a foot long. I bought them on a wet rainy day. About a fourth of them had mold.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "MANURE SMELL!!!!"
reviews.text: Actually it deserves 0 stars - none!!  I have purchased this product in past years with no problem in smell.  This year I purchased 5 bags (only amount I felt I could carry in my Lexus) and noticed as the So Portland ME Lowe's worker was placing them in my car, that there was a very distinctive odor of MANURE.  He said he noticed it also and felt that the bags had been placed next to manure bags so they took on that earthy fragrance.  I had to drive home with all windows down and immediately removed them from my car.  I spread the mulch around several Arbor Vitae trees my husband planted earlier and still noticed the horrible smell! The trees are on the property line behind our home - -= about 75 feet behind the house.  As I was sitting at our dining room table with the back door open and could still smell that horrible odor!  I will be seeing someone at Lowe's to complaint.  I'm so glad I did not buy more bags and certainly will NOT be purchasing any more of this mulch from Lowe's or anywhere else.  Must do a sniff test before completing a purchase of much ----- who knew?  I always loved the fresh smell of mulch - but NO MORE!!!!
reviews.author: cmc

reviews.title: "Fades quickly but the price is right"
reviews.text: On sale right now 5 for $10 and at that price I can't complain. Yes, it fades from black to dark brown quickly. I suspect, though I have not tried, that the brown fades to light brown too so what are you going to do? Dark mulch makes the color from bushes/flowers pop so I always go with the black!
reviews.author: Jason

reviews.title: "Great product"
reviews.text: I have used this mulch for several years. It last and looks good
reviews.author: Larf

reviews.title: "Exactly what I expected"
reviews.text: Mold? A little. Ants? Some. Foreign objects and wood chunks? A few. But I needed it to cover 1350 square feet I no longer want to mow. It did that and it looks great. If you want something better, pay more. I thought it was good for what I needed and the $2 per bag price saved me a bundl.
reviews.author: Lee

reviews.title: "Mixed results"
reviews.text: When it's on sale for $2 a bag it's a decent deal. It's ok for basic yard / landscaping. However it's not âPremium â and there's considerable variation from bag to bag. I just purchased 10 bags and 3 were black while 7 were brown. They loaded them off of two different palates so the dye lots must have been different. When these go on sale it's pretty popular so they bring in a lot. Make sure they load from the same palate.
reviews.author: Kennygooddeal

reviews.title: "Just horrible Stay away"
reviews.text: As other reviews pointed out not only bag was full of rotten, fungus wood, but also lot of waste material. They claim 1 year warranty, I think I lost the color in a week
reviews.author: Luv

reviews.title: "Awesome mulch"
reviews.text: I usually buy red mulch but wanted to give black a try this year. Ended up getting 30 bags at the sale Price of $2 per bag. This particular brand is such a value. I found hardly no garbage mixed in and it had a better smell then most mulch. It was very easy to spread and the black color is so deep and saturated. Never dries out and no color fade. Highly recommend to add a touch of style and class to your lawn and garden.
reviews.author: Jlynn

reviews.title: "Hardwood Mulch......Not!"
reviews.text: Some of the stuff in here might be hardwood, but a large portion is chipped fir, particle board and who knows what. I even found chunks of particle board with paint on them. Found one remnant of a 2x4 about 6" long. This stuff looks like chipped material from a demolition project that has been dyed. Look at your hands after handling it. Haven't found any termites yet. When it's on sale for $2.00 it's about priced right.
reviews.author: dogmeat

reviews.title: "Lowe's photos don't match"
reviews.text: The photos show âpremiumâ shredded mulch when it's actually wood chunks. Makes a huge difference when trying to spread out. The color doesn't even last a season
reviews.author: Jw

reviews.title: "Great mulch for the price"
reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase the mulch due to the many negative reviews.  I decided to take a chance when the price dropped to $2 per bag.  Total purchase was 40 bags and I did not notice any unusual debris, rocks or other surprises.  There were a few pieces of oversized wood that missed the last pass through the shredder, but nothing to really complain about.  Overall, I am quite pleased with the quality for the price.
reviews.author: Stengela

reviews.title: "Should be marketed as weed seed"
reviews.text: Bought this product and added to beds that have been in place and mulched for 18 years.  Within a couple of weeks the beds are covered 50% with young thriving weeds.  These weeds are a variety that I've never had on my property so I know they are a result of this mulch.
reviews.author: Disappointed

reviews.title: "There was an actual log in the bag!"
reviews.text: I found a log in the bag that was the length of a doorway and probably 3â wide.
reviews.author: Ann

reviews.title: "Great Deal"
reviews.text: I bought a total of 20 bags of mulch and it covered the area great. The mulch had a bad smell of manure which did go away after a couple of days.
reviews.author: Gearz

reviews.title: "Subterranean Termites"
reviews.text: Get ready to fight subterranean termites if you use this mulch...............
reviews.author: john

reviews.title: "Had difficulty breathing."
reviews.text: As I put the mulch down , the fumes cause me to have difficulty breathing. I had to stop applying and sit. The next day I went to work and had no breathing problems until I got home and started to lay the mulch . I don't know what is in the mulch but it is not good.
reviews.author: MK

reviews.title: "Rotten in the bag and smells like garbage bag"
reviews.text: Out of the 20 bags we got, half of them were rotten white inside and smelled bad. You get what you pay for.!!!STAY AWAY FROM THIS GARBAGE!!!
reviews.author: TomOhio

reviews.title: "Color fades"
reviews.text: Got 7 bags of black put out was nice for the first 2 days now the rain is fading it and look awful. And hasn't even been out a week.
reviews.author: Stacy

reviews.title: "You get what you pay for"
reviews.text: Total crap.  Full of pieces of unground lumber and particle board.  Even removed a fairly large rock.  Pay more, buy Scotts.
reviews.author: AC

reviews.title: "Very Happy"
reviews.text: Bought this mulch last year, it outlasted any other and my plants loved it. Well worth the price, buying more for this year.
reviews.author: niki

reviews.title: "Last a full year!"
reviews.text: Doesn't fade to a cheap, un-natural color - lasts longer then another I'v used here in Florida especially (~11 months).
reviews.author: CC

reviews.title: "Worst product"
reviews.text: I purchased this mulch about 2 weeks ago, I spread it in my flower beds but I noticed their were massive chucks of bark and trash in all 35 bags I purchased, I would not recommend this product to anyone who wants their mulch garden to look fabulous.
reviews.author: Spencer

reviews.title: "Not what I expected for all the sweat equity !"
reviews.text: For the almost $4 price and the word Premium on the bag, I was expecting a nice flat hardwood chipish looking mulch. What I got was a shredded, uneven slosh of woody something. Upon examination of the fine print on the bag, i discovered the distributer is the same exact one on the bag of the Walmart mulch which is sold for only $1.96 per bag. It is the same product in color and consistency. I don't mind the stick chunks, but I do mind the extra mark up for the same quality product. As the season goes on sometimes the mulch of the same product can change from March to say June. It's as if the person running the chipper or grinder is varying the size of the cuts. Or they are bagging the wrong product or mislabeling the product. This is why you see so many opened bags of mulch in the garden center. Now my mulch does not match the nice mulch I put down last year. Let the buyer beware!
reviews.author: jughead

reviews.title: "Definitely not premium mulch"
reviews.text: Liked the price but alas you get what you pay for.  Ours were hard to see as our Lowes had all the lights turned off 1 HR before closing.  Had we seen the white mold on our dark brown mulch we would have passed.  Once home in the dark didn't see the mood clearly, wife mentioned but I dismissed it as a good mulch would be treated for mold.  After laying it out noticed a lot of long, up to 8" sticks mixed in as well as green plastic strips of what I can only describe as case strapping mixed in as well.  Horrible product unless you buy your "premium" mulch from a gas station. Too bad I installed this in the dark, otherwise I would have just went back and asked for a refund and this time demanded someone help me unload as no one came to help us load the vehicle with 15 bags of soaked heavy mulch.  Used to think Lowes was a premium home improvement store but now one step below Menards.
reviews.author: Disappointed

reviews.title: "160 Bags of Mulch"
reviews.text: Great deal on mulch at 5 bags or $10. Ordered online. Getting 160 bags of mulch required using Lowes delivery which was a deal at just $65. Lowes called us 45 seconds after the order was placed online to arrange a delivery date.On the day delivery was scheduled the delivery person was prompt, pleasant and extremely helpful. A great Lowes representative for the Voorhees NJ Lowes and an A+ transaction...
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "From a Landscape Professional's View"
reviews.text: I have used over 800 bags of the Premium Brown Mulch this year on different properties throughout our area. My clients are absolutely thrilled with the results. Aesthetically, cost wise and the staying power of this mulch in high wind locations are fantastic. There may be a slight loss of color as the year goes on, but nothing really noticeable.  Waiting for the next sale so I can grab another 500 bags!
reviews.author: Kris

reviews.title: "Will not purchase again"
reviews.text: I bought a few bags and the color faded the next day, some 12 month guarantee! There isn't a phone number to contact and I am sure Lowe's will not refund the money spent. I thought it might be a few bags that this happened with, so I decided to buy a few more to finish one bed. The same thing happened. You get what you pay for. I used Scotts mulch previously, guess I will go back to spending more $$.
reviews.author: KAWL

reviews.title: "Will not purchase again"
reviews.text: I bought a few bags and the color faded the next day, some 12 month guarantee! There isn't a phone number to contact and I am sure Lowe's will not refund the money spent. I thought it might be a few bags that this happened with, so I decided to buy a few more to finish one bed. The same thing happened. You get what you pay for. I used Scotts mulch previously, guess I will go back to spending more $$.
reviews.author: KAWL

reviews.title: "Full of termites!"
reviews.text: Bought this product in 2016 in NC and each bag was full of termites in the center of the bag.
reviews.author: Mom22

reviews.title: "Recommend"
reviews.text: Purchased 35 bags, going back for 20 more as soon as it is on sale again for 5 for $10.
reviews.author: Don

reviews.title: "Going with 2-stars"
reviews.text: 2-stars leaves me room to downgrade to 1-star or up it to 3-stars if it doesn't fade within a month.  Bought 105 bags and 105 of them smelled like MANURE!  Since I spread it all around my house, my entire yard smells like a farm. So much for having the windows open on a nice May day. Picking up, moving around and spreading 105 bags is a lot of work so I hope the color lasts and the smell goes away.
reviews.author: Stvmcl

reviews.title: "brown mulch"
reviews.text: I bought 20 bags to spread in my front beds. Worked fine. No foreign material, no mold
reviews.author: melanie

reviews.title: "Not good"
reviews.text: This is the worst quality mulch I have ever purchased.  Huge chips of wood, sticks and pieces of plastic were in the mulch. The material size and and was not uniform and looks horrible in the garden.  Will never purchase again.
reviews.author: Gardner

reviews.title: "Manure in a bag"
reviews.text: Horrendous manure smell.  There is literally nothing "premium" about this mulch.
reviews.author: Disappointed

reviews.title: "Great flower bed mulch."
reviews.text: We've been mulching the wife's flower beds for about twenty years now with 7 cu yds (+/- 30 bags) per year.  This product, purchased in north central Ohio, met all our expectations.  The color is what brown mulch should be.  Any variation is only due to moisture which evaporates quickly.  The consistency also is what you should expect, neither powdered nor chunky.  This mulch will make you happy!
reviews.author: Restless1

reviews.title: "Cheap looking mulch"
reviews.text: Big chucks of mulch with lots of white mold on it. Do not buy this mulch!
reviews.author: kp

reviews.title: "Great product for the cost"
reviews.text: Worked out great. The bag dosent go as far as you think so get extra.
reviews.author: monkybx

reviews.title: "Decrotive Ground Cover"
reviews.text: This is NOT "Mulch" as I know it.  The bags I have purchased work well for decorative cover but it is nothing more than ground-up used pallets with a bunch of dye on it.  One bag had a rock in it the size of a baseball.
reviews.author: Rob

reviews.title: "Complete Junk!"
reviews.text: This mulch was full of wood chunks.  Some of it was manufactured wood and I could see the laminated sheets in the wood blocks.  It also contained plastic, paper, and electrical wire.  Don't waste your money on this!
reviews.author: RoHawk

reviews.title: "horrible"
reviews.text: We found a golf ball, a stump, and a solid brass knob thing.
reviews.author: rob

reviews.title: "Termites in bags"
reviews.text: Great buy for two dollars, but make sure you spray for bugs!
reviews.author: Sherry

reviews.title: "Quality product excellent sale price of 2.00 per"
reviews.text: We are very satisfied with 130 bags of mulch. No bugs, no large unusable pieces (very consistent size) and no stain. This is our 8th year of using various other mulches for this project and the first year that we have been satisified with a mulch and the end results in our yard. We are anxious to have the color last for a year as guaranteed. Best landscaping deal we have had in a long time.
reviews.author: Merry

reviews.title: "It does the job"
reviews.text: We purchase this mulch every year when it goes on sale. The color doesn't last the 12 months states on the bag, but it last through spring, summer and most of Fall. When Spring rolls back around, we just top it off with mulch again. Pretty simple process for us. Overall, it serves its purpose. We haven't had a large amount of bugs or critters like some others have stated in their reviews.
reviews.author: JS4

reviews.title: "color was lost in one day!"
reviews.text: Twelve month garantee!?  Color was gone the next day!
reviews.author: dave

reviews.title: "Color Guarantee Is a Joke"
reviews.text: Bought and spread mulch in December, 2018.  As of February 2019, the black color was gone and now the mulch is a faded brown.  Why do you put a 12 month color guarantee on every bag if it fades after 2 months.
reviews.author: Jrobin

reviews.title: "Terrible Mulch"
reviews.text: The color varied greatly from bag to bag, and it all has washed out and lightened up and less than 2 weeks.  Finally some bags were very fine and ground up, and others had huge sticks and even rocks in them!
reviews.author: pubolandse

reviews.title: "Premium is an exaggeration."
reviews.text: I have purchased this regularly for a few years. Two years ago the bags had large chunks with nails in them. Luckily I had gloves on.  Last year was better and the pieces were smaller. I still had an occasional piece of construction material. I have had mulch delivered and it was better,  but the bags are convenient and less labor to deal with. I guess I need to think about other brands.
reviews.author: gardenerplus

reviews.title: "Only mulch we've bought!"
reviews.text: We purchased 8 bags of this mulch thinking that would be enough for our small-ish flower bed we were planting. We purchased all of our flowers and mulch at Lowe's and was very pleased! Unfortunately, we didn't purchase enough so we had to go back and buy 20 more bags! We are just as happy with the 8 bags as the 20 more that we bought. The mulch and flower bed looks great, thanks Lowe's!
reviews.author: Jennifer

reviews.title: "Hit and Miss"
reviews.text: First off what can you possibly expect at $2 a bag. It was mulch it was black in color. One bag was wet and had mildew. The other nine bags were perfect. They did the job and now my yard is  beautiful. I didn't experience any nails or plastic in my bags. But that's not to say it didn't happen to others. The bag that has mold and mildew smelled awful. But after a day or so it faded away
reviews.author: Sierra

reviews.title: "Timing is Everything!"
reviews.text: To keep a yard looking nice requires maintenance. We have the task of weeding, seeding and planting at least twice a year. With an area that requires over 40 cubic yards of mulch, every deal counts. LOWE'S provided a premium product at a great price!!! They even made things easy with online ordering and next day delivery. Our yard and garden schedule has just been reset by LOWE'S
reviews.author: EASY

reviews.title: "Good HARDWOOD mulch"
reviews.text: Bought it on sale @ 5/$10. Great deal for good quality mulch. Bags are easier work than shoveling loose mulch. I've used this product for two previous seasons. Color doesn't fade quickly.
reviews.author: Shack

reviews.title: "Garbage"
reviews.text: Nothing Positive to mention about the "Premium" product. It is filled with construction debry , 2x4s ,pieces of plywood etc. The color leached after the first rain. Stay Away
reviews.author: DVD101

reviews.title: "Don't use"
reviews.text: Nearly every bag I opened had ground up metal, wire, plastic, and unknown junk mixed in.  Why would a store stock stuff like this?
reviews.author: Tom

reviews.title: "This is not mulch, it's rotting kindling"
reviews.text: I am very disappointed in Lowe's mulch.  To sum it up, it's junk wood with some sprayed substance on it that is already quite faded by the time the customer gets it.  Another big problem is the size of the particles.  It used to be pretty consistent. Now, it's not uncommon to find sticks 1" thick and 6 to 10" long.  This is not your father's mulch.  Don't waste your money.
reviews.author: ernie

reviews.title: "Large chunks"
reviews.text: I purchased 25 bags to put around my trees and flowers. I found one piece of wood that had a nail still attached. I also found several boards that were in the mulch as well large rocks. I finally kept a bucket to toss the misfit pieces so my lawn mower doesn't hit them. I doubt I buy this product again in spite of the great price. The lower price indicated a poor product.
reviews.author: Grammy

reviews.title: "Color variance"
reviews.text: I bought 12 bags recently for my girl friends house, and 9 of the bags were a consistent reddish brown color, 3 were almost black, and one was varied within.  The mulch size is good and fairly consistent (not too many big pieces), but the colors can vary and you need to be wary of this.  For the same price of $2/bag I will deal with it, but not worth it at regular price.
reviews.author: Jer

reviews.title: "Mediocre but cheap"
reviews.text: Used 30 bags of brown and need more to finish a project. As some said there is garbage in it you can see a few pieces in each bag. Bag says it's all natural forest product and dye but that's not true, bits of plastic like part you tear off to open a milk bottle, a crushed hunk from a tin can, tiles smooth edged pieces with blue pAint on one side, little shreds of plastic from like shopping bags, rocks, and other tidbits.  It's almost like they mulched an old desk with blue led paint and some junk inside.  I never saw this crap in any mulch I got in past at hardware stores.  But it seemed like okay color and only a little trash . The smell is mildew or mold and the bags were a little wet inside. A few has a lot of white spots but most didn't have much mold I could see.   As far as I can tell it looks ok so far. When it dries the color lightened from the color it was when I laid it, and if you look under it is darker.
reviews.author: Junkman

reviews.title: "check your bags"
reviews.text: We just finished putting down 60 bags of this mulch, and while the color is nice and beds look good from the street, up close the mulch is inconsistent in size. We have nice wood pieces, but also have lots of very large wood chunks Some of the pieces are 1 x1' by about 2", I don't know how the color will hold, but we will see. I doubt if we will use this product again,
reviews.author: Judi

reviews.title: "Mediocre but cheap"
reviews.text: Used 30 bags of brown and need more to finish a project. As some said there is garbage in it you can see a few pieces in each bag. Bag says it's all natural forest product and dye but that's not true, bits of plastic like part you tear off to open a milk bottle, a crushed hunk from a tin can, tiles smooth edged pieces with blue pAint on one side, little shreds of plastic from like shopping bags, rocks, and other tidbits.  It's almost like they mulched an old desk with blue led paint and some junk inside.  I never saw this crap in any mulch I got in past at hardware stores.  But it seemed like okay color and only a little trash . The smell is mildew or mold and the bags were a little wet inside. A few has a lot of white spots but most didn't have much mold I could see.   As far as I can tell it looks ok so far. When it dries the color lightened from the color it was when I laid it, and if you look under it is darker.
reviews.author: Junkman

reviews.text: Very poor quality, contains large pieces of wood, paper, pine cones, rubber, plastic, string, etc.  I think the $2.00 covers the dye and bag because the "mulch" must be free debris from the woods.  With that said, from a distance it looks like the same mulch I had delivered and was triple cut.  By the end of summer it all looks the same.  I would probably buy it again.
reviews.author: nlee

reviews.title: "Mulch Quality - Terrible"
reviews.text: Bought 3 bags of this product. Worse looking mulch I ever purchased. Not ground very fine, just the opposite, big chunks of bark 2-3 inches long throughout each bag. Doesn't cover very well due to the size of the material. Unfortunately opened the bags so I couldn't return it, glad I only had a small space to use it in. Would not recommend this product for any purpose.
reviews.author: Nat

reviews.title: "Brown mulch"
reviews.text: I see the bad rating for black but the brown is really good.  I use every 3 years and it maintains its color tremendously and for the price you can't beat it.
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Color lasted 2 days"
reviews.text: I bought 30 bags of this mulch to do around my house. I used it first in two larger planter beds next to my driveway and it happened to rain two days later which conveniently removed all the color from the mulch. I would never buy this product again nor would I suggest anyone else waste their money unless they want faded brown mixed with some small patches of black.
reviews.author: Murse

reviews.title: "So Far, So Good"
reviews.text: I read the reviews prior to buying this mulch.  Its been down for a week and we've had rain 4 of those days and so far no fading.  All bags were consistently uniform.  I also didn't have the mold issues some people have described.  I used 20 bags.  I did find some large pieces of wood, which I just removed and tossed out.  For $2.00 a bag, its well worth the price.
reviews.author: DIYet

reviews.title: "Spend a little more money on a quality product."
reviews.text: The mulch is garbage.  Large chunks of wood in it. Some 5"-6" inches long.  This isn't mulch. It's colored wood chunks. After a rain, that's all you see.
reviews.author: cbyrd

reviews.title: "What a classy look.  Totally satisfied."
