reviews.text: Been using this at different homes for years now.  I just love love love it.  The black color has stayed long for me.  Nice quality.  Simply no complaints.  First time for our current home.  60 bags down last sale, front is done.  Now on to the back - at least 50 more bags!  Wish we could afford a groundskeeper, but once we're done, it looks like we have one!
reviews.author: CathiO

reviews.title: "Great Price .. Great Mulch!"
reviews.text: I have been putting this mulch down for years ..   I use both the brown and the red .. and both are quality product.   I actually work at Lowes and have access to it all.   There is nothing .. here in the Midwest .. wrong with this mulch.   I definitely recommend it .. and when it's on sale .. that's even better!   Don't be afraid to try it .. you'll like it!
reviews.author: Tomi

reviews.title: "It's Mulch"
reviews.text: Love the way it looks; A different look than you usually see, and at a great price.
reviews.author: Chad

reviews.title: "How cac you put premium on the bag?"
reviews.text: I hate it see mulch not considered premium. This was loaded with large pieces pieces of wood for mulch, it is not shredded well a all With some pieces being 3 inches long. Will never buy again, not for an area like a front yard.  May be ok for an area out in the back forty. It is cheap compared to triple shredded, but I will go with the good stuff. I have
reviews.author: Goblue

reviews.title: "mulch"
reviews.text: Come on people its mulch for 2 dollars a bag. Use it to fill your beds, then top it with a better  mulch. It will save u money.
reviews.author: jb

reviews.title: "color does not match from bag to bag"
reviews.text: I purchased 40 + bags this spring I noticed a significant color difference In multi bags  mulch is a low grade at best large chunks of wood down to almost dust. next year I will skip the bag mulch and go buy by the yard at a local landscape company.. sorry lowes I thought I would be coming back next year due to the ease of using bags.. not really worth it
reviews.author: mnj7333

reviews.title: "Poor excuse for mulch"
reviews.text: I don't know how this product can be labeled mulch, much less premium mulch. It contains pieces of wood, sticks branch pieces.
reviews.author: dave

reviews.title: "Good, cheap, well-packaged mulch"
reviews.text: Holds color well, spreads easily, pretty free of foreign matter. No more expensive than buying in bulk from a nursery, cheaper if you get it on sale. It's way easier to get bagged mulch to and from your site than bulk mulch anyway. The bags are nice and strong too. One of the bags fell off my trailer while doing 55 on a highway and it didn't come open.
reviews.author: projectguy2

reviews.title: "Very Disappointed"
reviews.text: We fould alot or trash and huge sticks and chucks of wood. Some bags smelt awful. Very nervous to see how it holds up.
reviews.author: Leah

reviews.title: "Worst Purchase Ever"
reviews.text: I bought 10 bags of this "black" mulch to put in my shrub beds. Within 24 hours of application, after the mulch was dry, it turned a brownish color with no resemblence to what it looked like in the bag.The work mulch is misleading. This product is a bag of dyed wood chips with foreign objects contained within, such as plastic and metal fragments.
reviews.author: Disappointed-Customer

reviews.text: Just had 375 bags delivered to the house - quality and consistency is excellent throughout each pallet.
reviews.author: ValueKing

reviews.title: "Don't waste your money - this is NOT premium mulch"
reviews.text: The last two years we purchased Preen Mulch with Weed Preventer.  I just purchased a pallet of this "Premium" Brown Mulch on sale for $2.00/bag.  There were rocks, electrical wire, nails and balls of clay in the bags I purchased.  I will gladly pay the premium and purchase the Preen Mulch in the future.
reviews.author: James

reviews.title: "Mulching"
reviews.text: I have always used the cypress mulch. This year Lowes had a special 5 bags of 2-cu.ft. for $10. I purchased and used 30 bags of mulch giving a 4" depth the the area. Im curious on the lasting color guarantee and weed preventive (12 months) will prove itself??? We will see. I have taken a picture and in 12 months I will take another and compare.
reviews.author: NANNY

reviews.title: "Not all browns are the same"
reviews.text: My hubby bought 60 bags 3 different times and started spreading bark only to find one bag could be a light choc. brown with small fine chips and the next would be dark brown with huge chips. Each grouping came from the same pallet and it was a mix. And you can't tell from the outside of the bag because the bag is colored. Not a good experience.
reviews.author: Sue

reviews.title: "Moldy Mulch"
reviews.text: I bought 10 bags of this mulch.  I had used it before and it was fine.I don't know if the batch I got was super wet, but hidden inside the bag was all this white fuzzy mold all over the mulch.  I opened another bag, and was able to use the top 3" of it, and hit mold again.  I was so grossed out I tossed the rest of the bag.  Such a waste :(
reviews.author: LVGarden

reviews.title: "Color Guarantee?"
reviews.text: The bag states 12 month color guarantee, problem is what color? I purchased 25 bags and every bag was a different shade of "brown". As i was spreading it, i keep thinking of the movie "50 shades of.."If color is what your looking for, move on to a higher quality and brand. It is shredded, and it is mulch, so for the price not a catastrophe.
reviews.author: bg3

reviews.title: "Loved"
reviews.text: Purchased Mar 5 2018 loved the outcome colored stayed true up until i removed on 2019April11. Sorry no pics without a bunch of kiddos lol. We will Definitely be using this brand next spring at our new duty station. We purchased Scotts Nature this spring 2019 and will not be doing that again. If you have to choose stick with the Premium
reviews.author: Duchess

reviews.title: "Huge Chunks"
reviews.text: Besides various pieces of garbage, this "mulch" has large chunks of wood included, which make it very difficult to spread.  I purchase this same mulch last year and it was far better than what was sold this year.  Also, the color fades very quickly.  You might get 2 weeks of black, but that would only be on the "logs" that are included.
reviews.author: Kary

reviews.title: "THIN MULCH WILL TURN TO SOIL QUICKLY"
reviews.text: I purchased Lowes "Premium" Brown Mulch last Summer because it was two bucks a bag. In my opinion, it is not premium mulch. It is so finely cut that it breaks down quickly into brown soil. I suggest you spend a little more and buy Scotts instead.
reviews.author: RobJ

reviews.title: "Not even worth $2"
reviews.text: This is the worst mulch we have ever purchased!  Not to mention, my wife picked up 15 bags, and she had to load it in the car herself!  Some of the mulch had some sort of white coating, probably mold. The existing mulch that this was replacing, was actually better looking!  I guess we'll go back to Scotts, or switch to the Agway mulch.
reviews.author: RayD

reviews.title: "Worked great for me"
reviews.text: I bought this because it was on sale and I had been wanting to put some mulch around my vegetable garden beds. Yes, it stinks. It took less than 24 hours for the smell to disperse in the yard, and even though I transported in an enclosed SUV, no lasting smell in the car.The color did stain my nails brown, even though I wore gloves. I can't speak towards the durability of the color, because that doesn't matter much to me in veggie beds and I just finished putting it down yesterday.I will say I went back 3 times to buy more, so I'm pretty sure I got mulch from different pallets as the stuff was flying out the door of Lowe's all weekend, and I am very happy with the quality of mulch. No pieces more than 6" long and only maybe 1-2 per bag that were even that long.Here's my advice: If you want it to look professional, hire a landscaper or spring for the name brand mulch. If you are just concerned about protecting your plants, this stuff works great.
reviews.author: sarabugstar

reviews.title: "Dirty"
reviews.text: Prior to putting mulch down I sprayed Kills All ( which I have found to work great) on entire area that I mulched. I now have weeds, tree seedlings, and various other plants growing out of the mulch. Have had to treat the mulch now with kills all which was an added cost. Kind of defeated the reason for using mulch in the first place.
reviews.author: Mazamillion

reviews.title: "Brown hardwood mulch smells like manure and has mo"
reviews.text: Terrible odor like cow manure. Mold in bark too. Do not buy.
reviews.author: L

reviews.title: "Looks great so far"
reviews.text: I recently purchased 35 bags of this mulch. It was extremely easy to put down and has increased the curb appeal of my home tremendously.Just be careful when spreading - all of mine had miscellaneous trash that missed their quality control: rubber bands, plastic (both hard pieces and soft bag like material), paper materials, even glass!I can't say if it lasts or not but for the price I'll be happy if I can get a year out of it and top it off each year after.
reviews.author: JoeE

reviews.title: "black mulch $2"
reviews.text: We buy it every year when on sale for $2, easy to spread
reviews.author: shop2much2

reviews.title: "chunky mulch"
reviews.text: I bought this mulch when it was on sale for 4 bags for $10, a pretty great deal. However, it turned out to be not such a great deal because there were a lot of branches as well as sizable chunks of wood in each bag. I bought 150 bags of this stuff and was disappointed with the overall quality and consistency of the material.
reviews.author: Joan

reviews.title: "poor standard in the quality of mulch"
reviews.text: I bought a total of 50 bags. In my first purchase of 20 bags, the mulch was very fine quality shredded mulch. Unfortunately, my second purchase of 30 bags was not fine. It was more coarse, wood Chunks, nothing Premium! Poor purchase experience for me. Next time, I will be buying from a local garden/landscape mulch supplier!
reviews.author: RC

reviews.title: "cheapest bags EVER!"
reviews.text: since it was $2 per bag, we loaded up. The seams to 85% of the bags burst open (it was not roughly handled as there were few tears) and I spent too much time cleaning up. Not sure of the quality of the mulch yet but they sure "cheaped" out on the packaging bags. Just look how many product capture bags there are at Lowe's.
reviews.author: L

reviews.title: "Mulch is not quality by a long shot !!!"
reviews.text: I have purchased and used all three colors( black, brown and red). All faded as soon as a little rain hit it !!!! Don't waste your time and money. I was tempted to purchase because of the 2 dollar a bag price today. Can't waste my money and time. Have to go another route.
reviews.author: Monk

reviews.title: "It's changed"
reviews.text: Our neighborhood has purchased this product for a few years, but this spring it was chipped much finer and has not lasted as expected. We usually purchase several hundred bags to have delivered and will not order this product again unless they return to old product size. Also, it doesn;t seem shredded but chipped now.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "it's mulch, it works"
reviews.text: Bought 14 bags of the black mulch - the quality was good, no moldy spots and less junk in it than last year. Just a few pieces to pick out. It has been rained on 3 times in the last week and still looks nice and dark. Just count your bags if the employees load for you - I was shorted a bag in my first trip this year.
reviews.author: DrheTher

reviews.title: "A bag of JUNK, not mulch"
reviews.text: Would give -10 rating if possible. I purchased 10 bags of this junk and returned 7 today after I had absolutely had it with this junk! A couple of days ago I found part of a rubber glove, cloth, pieces of wood that were painted blue (what do they use to make this junk), plastic, some mold, and other junk. I did take in some of the blue painted wood, for what it's worth. When I opened a bag this morning that had a very large amount of mold I was through. I am mid-70's with medical issues and have to do a lot of my yard work, heavy or not, because the lawn people charge by the neighborhood & I am unable to pay their  ridiculously high prices. I had to lift the bags back into my car to return them to the store, which was not at all easy, especially after working in heat and humidity. Not to mention a waste of my time and inability to complete work this morning, as well as gas to return this junk. I had a receipt for the 10 bags; however, since I sifted through and used 3 bags, threw out molded parts and junk, I was to only be reimbursed for the 7 bags. Thank God I had cancelled the extra 10 I purchased the next day because I was concerned that it was too much for me to do. Last year I returned several bags that were high content mold. This is what killed my beautiful peonies that I moved from my previous home. I recall seeing mold when applying the mulch, but for some dumb reason I thought the sun and heat would kill it. When I dug them up the roots were white with mold. Since that time, no plants have survived in that portion of my flower bed.After experiencing a couple of other other problems with Lowes, I have had it. It was bad enough having difficulty finding someone to help when in the store day or night, but to suffer aggravation, inconvenience and loss of time and money, I'm done!
reviews.author: MsVivacious

reviews.title: "Does the job!"
reviews.text: I purchased 25 bags of this mulch and will be going back today for 25 more. For the purpose I needed it, it works beautifully! No mold, fungus, debris, weird smell or anything suspicious. Just straight forward, black mulch. I've been cleaning flower beds up and putting down the mulch without any issues. Good luck!
reviews.author: Yehara

reviews.text: I have bought this mulch from Lowe's in the past and have been very satisfied. This year I bought 15 bags and it was junk. It doesn't retain it's color and had chunks of wood almost six inches long. I'm not sure if Lowe's changed their supplier this year, but if so they need to go back to their previous supplier.
reviews.author: Gary

reviews.title: "Nothing Lasts Forever"
reviews.text: The reviews I saw were 5 years old from 2012!  In 2016 and 2017 the mulch I bought has been very good:  it retained its color and was fine enough for a close-up walk-through flower garden.  I use about 150 bags per year and I appreciate this mulch most after trying other vendors when this mulch is not on sale.
reviews.author: Ron

reviews.title: "Great Mulch for the price!"
reviews.text: We have used this mulch for 7 years. It is very black not dark brown. It will stay black for the season. I have found a few small plastic parts in the bags here and there. I normally use 20 bags per year and have never had any issues with mold like other brands. I buy when it is $2 a bag cant beat the price!
reviews.author: Beckstr84

reviews.title: "Mulch as expected"
reviews.text: This batch Purchased in May 2017 on sale although I have used it before and that is why I purchased again. No surprises, Mulch as expected no debris of any type as I have read in other reviews. Color is fine compared to previous seasons mild fading. It was wet to some extent because of rain previous to purchase, it's stored out in the open so I'm not surprised it was wet, especially the upper bags of the pallet. No bugs/termites, although I have purchased plants that were termite infested, not necessarily from Lowes. Quick fix was carpenter ant/termite killer solution in the hole prior to planting, problem solved, plant is doing fine no sign of termites. I have learned not to use wood mulch next to the house period. Because regardless of brand and even Cedar it eventually breaks down and it's like ringing the dinner bell. I use rubber mulches/stone next to the house and the wood for hedge rows, berms and beds farther away. Overall I am pleased with the product and would recommend.
reviews.author: Zdad

reviews.title: "Didn't need the 'extras'."
reviews.text: I got this on sale so it was a good deal. However, ya hafta wonder where they get/make this stuff. Found some unwanted extras in the mulch, like dog doodoo(old, petrified) and beer can tabs (the ones they haven't made for years. Overall, the mulch is ok and was a good deal. Just puzzled about the extras.
reviews.author: Peddlertoo

reviews.title: "Colored wood chips"
reviews.text:
not very impressed by this product. the black substance sprayed on the wood chips comes right off - at least it is easy to wash off your hands. The wood chips are comparable to what I can get at the local dump for free. hard to see much value in this product - which explains the price.

Not recommended
reviews.author: IggysPop

reviews.title: "Rocks inside bags"
reviews.text: I am not sure it is normal but there are a lot of rocks some 3" x 2".  I hope like some said in their reviews that the color will fade when it dries.  The brown I got is more black than expected and the red is pretty red!  Not a pleasant red.  I bought both red and brown and rocks were in both colors.
reviews.author: MJB

reviews.title: "Great Value for the Money."
reviews.text: I purchased 140 bags of brown mulch and did not have any problems with termites or bugs.  Mulch color was very good and it keeps its color as stated for a year. It does decompose as we have to re apply the mulch every year.  This is our 3 year using this product and can only give a good review on it.
reviews.author: Paul

reviews.title: "Horrible"
reviews.text: Bought 20 bags online for store pickup. Order was ready and loaded up quickly at the store, but my issues were just beginning.  The smell of the bags were awful. I attributed this to the standing water on the bags, which were just thrown in the back of my SUV. When I got home and unloaded, many bags were open and spilling all over.  I immediately unloaded and installed the mulch in my landscaping. However, the water was leaking all over and stained many parts of my concrete black. After installing, I found the mulch to be low quality,  with rocks and sticks mixed in. The worst part is the smell.  It is like we installed a farm in our yard. The mulch was supposed to be the final touch for our memorial day weekend, however the smell and look is awful. I watered down the mulch to try and remove the smell, only to find the die came off almost immediately.  I will be contacting the store after the weekend, but how do I return installed mulch, or get a refund for a car detail or power wash of my driveway? Do yourself a favor and buy a better brand.
reviews.author: Jason

reviews.title: "Black Mulch be careful of bugs."
reviews.text: I got 15 bags of mulch, and when I opened one of the bags, it was infested with ants. They swarmed my legs and arms and I'm covered in bites. Luckily I had a hose close by so I could spray the ants off me. I got out some raid and covered the area. Just a warning to becareful when opening mulch.
reviews.author: Barb

reviews.title: "Colors Vary by Lot"
reviews.text: This product is garbage. I normally purchase mulch by the yard but this Spring only called for touch-up so a large quantity wasn't needed; or so I thought. I purchased 20 bags of brown mulch and laid it; was surprised that it didn't get me vary far. I returned to Lowe's and purchased another 40 bags of brown mulch - I opened the first bag and the mulch was black! I returned the entire lot to Lowe's only to find out my initial batch was a completely different color. Lowe's was very helpful to try to find a suitable replacement to match the initial 20 bags of brown mulch but was unsuccessful - I returned the remainder of the 2nd batch of mulch. I purchased 4 yards of mulch and had it delivered from a reputable landscape company - much easier and better quality product! Do yourself a favor and skip this "5 for 10" deal - if you do purchase make sure you buy enough to not need a 2nd batch as the color will most likely be different. You get what you pay for in this product - bagged dried up garbage.
reviews.author: Storm

reviews.title: "good looking mulch"
reviews.text: bought 7 bags of this mulch to do my flower bed, I used a shovel to put it on the bed, and used my hand to rake it around the base of the flowers. When done my hands were dyed black! This makes me think the color will not last, looks great now but I fear the first rain will wash it off.
reviews.author: litman

reviews.title: "Awful!"
reviews.text: Waste of money! Even at the sale price! If this had been sold to me for 25 cents a bag, it is still not worth it! Huge chunks of wood and sticks.. does not even resemble mulch. Never again. Bought 15 bags! This stuff will never disintegrate .., I'll have to rake it up to get rid of it.
reviews.author: Cb

reviews.title: "Not hardwood"
reviews.text: This lowes internet ad says that this mulch is HARDWOOD.  It is not.  Nowhere on the bag does it say hardwood.  I called the mgf and was told that if it did not have hardwood on the bag that it is not hardwood.  Dont put pine bark next to your house unless you want to invite termites.
reviews.author: Tom

reviews.title: "Poor Quality"
reviews.text: I placed this product yesterday. Too early to comment on one year color. However the quality was poor becuase the mulch contained lots of pieces of lumber and brush some as long as 8 inches, as well as chunks of metal and plastic. I had to pick out all of the junk before I could use.
reviews.author: Fstopf22

reviews.title: "ok for price"
reviews.text: I noticed most of the reviews were from years ago???  I purchased 100 bags and it covers well.  I did find some pieces of wood chunks and some of the bags had some mold (white color).  FOr the price it's well worth it.  It does last for good part of the year and color stays good.
reviews.author: neighbor

reviews.title: "No problems with the mulch"
reviews.text: I noticed the comments for the year 2017 gave poor reviews, I disagree. 176 bags were delivered 5/1/2017 and so far 66 bags were used and no problem with our mulch and the $2.00 per bag was an excellent price. The only downside is the wife and I are spreading the mulch ourselves.
reviews.author: Pete

reviews.title: "Color has lasted over 12 months"
reviews.text: We fixed this bed around our mailbox last year and it is still extremely black! My only guess is maybe one lot had a bad dye job and that's why there are so many terrible reviews on this product. It's cheap mulch. I am buying it again this season to expand to my other beds.
reviews.author: tjsmyrna

reviews.title: "great for playground"
reviews.text: We purchased this mulch for under our new playset. I then came online to see these reviews of debris and bugs found in these bags. We have emptied 16 bags so far and need about another 16. I have yet to find one piece of garbage or insect. Really satisfied with this product.
reviews.author: kpetro

reviews.title: "No Issue"
reviews.text: I honestly didnt see a difference between more expensive brands and this one. THEY ALL FADE! this cheap stuff got me through spring and summer looking great last year.  As i couldnt buy enough i had to buy  few bags of the more expensive stuff. Guess what? Its just as faded.
reviews.author: Gregc

reviews.title: "Good for sprucing up your yard!"
reviews.text: I was selling my house and decided to try and make it look a little nicer so I bought a bunch of bags and put it in all of the natural areas around my house. Boy did it make a difference! It helped to spruce things up a bit for the showings. I highly recommend this mulch.
reviews.author: DIYGUY

reviews.title: "I bought this!!!!!"
reviews.text: Once purchased, I put them in my truck and went home. Once there I took them out and placed them on the driveway. Once there I picked them up one at a time (I'm not He-Man) and opened them. Once opened I poured them on the ground in the area I wanted to and spread them out. Repeat process for each bag!!Its been a week and they are still in the same spot in my yard...WINNING!! One piece of advice, over estimate. I had to go back and buy more bags which as you read earlier is quite a process.
reviews.author: Chad

reviews.title: "Stay clear"
reviews.text: I'm glad the mulch was on sale and I purchased only six bags as it was loaded with mold and at lease one of the bags teaming with small ants.    The mold made the brown mulch look more like tan and it's obvious you don't want to bring ants anywhere close to your home.
reviews.author: Wally

reviews.title: "Dyed Waste"
reviews.text: We bought several bags of this mulch. It appears to be dyed industrial/construction waste. We found large chunks of wood painted blue that the dye had not taken to, and there were shredded bits of paper labels and some orange plastic garbage throughout. It smells awful.
reviews.author: BarnacleGoose

reviews.title: "Infested with termites"
reviews.text: BEWARE!!!! I purchased 15 bags at the Willoughby Ohio store during the Memorial Day sale. It was infested with termites and I had to rake it all out and then spray my entire front landscaping area and foundation with termite killer! DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT!
reviews.author: Lynne

reviews.title: "Premium Brown mulch"
reviews.text: We put down @ 22 bags over the past 3 weeks.  We think its great for the price (we used to use pine needles--which we think are superior, but are now too expensive).  One batch initially had a VERY strong order, but that has dissipated.We are very happy with it.
reviews.author: Patti

reviews.title: "Black does last a week, never mind 12 months!"
reviews.text: Spent a whole day putting bags upon bags of this product in my flower beds.  2 days later it looks like crummy wood chips.  We had a bit of rain -- not a storm, mind you -- just some drizzle and most of the color was washed away.  Stay away from this product!!!
reviews.author: WoodChips

reviews.title: "Black does last a week, never mind 12 months!"
reviews.text: Spent a whole day putting bags upon bags of this product in my flower beds.  2 days later it looks like crummy wood chips.  We had a bit of rain -- not a storm, mind you -- just some drizzle and most of the color was washed away.  Stay away from this product!!!
reviews.author: WoodChips

reviews.title: "Poor quality mulch"
reviews.text: I bought a name brand mulch from a competitor the day before and then bought this mulch the next day.  This mulch had lots of mold, large chunks, construntion debris and lots of water.  Lesson learned go with the name brand for the same price at the competitor
reviews.author: Westnc

reviews.title: "Very good"
reviews.text: I would have given the mulch a FIVE star but some bags had large pieces of not shredded wood. Otherwise, quality is very good.Just putting the mulch down, I don't know how the color will last.I rated it as excellent value with purchasing it for 5 for $10.
reviews.author: slick

reviews.title: "Brown Mulch"
reviews.text: I buy this around three day weekends, they usually have it on sale 5/$10. I have learned to go on the first day so as to avoid the return trip for will call! It sells out fast. I put down newspapers, then the mulch and it gives my flower beds a finished look.
reviews.author: Buppie

reviews.title: "Broken Bags"
reviews.text: Have used this mulch before with no problems. The company must be using different packaging methods. Noticed when they were loading my 35 bags the bags were breaking or had been broken. Unloaded at home and what a mess, bags continued to be breaking open!!
reviews.author: Joe

reviews.title: "NOT Premium!"
reviews.text: We bought this a few weeks ago when it was on sale.  Besides mulch, the bags contains a bunch of trash and yard waste.  There were chunks of plywood, osb, and dimensional lumber as well as nails, metal, and plastic.  There was also acorns and sweetgum balls.
reviews.author: Nick

reviews.title: "Good Mulch"
reviews.text: I purchased about 200 bags of this for a new house. I found the mulch to be consistent in texture in all bags. No foreign matter in any of the bags. It has been on the ground three months and still looks good. Will buy again. Good service by Lowes staff.
reviews.author: Jlm0812

reviews.title: "Pretty darn good stuff!"
reviews.text: I was hesitant after reading other reviews, but I purchased 15 bags, and I'm going back for more.Beautiful, clean, great smelling mulch with out filler, its just as good as local stuff that is dumped but that's a lot more money.I say give it a try!
reviews.author: NatureDude

reviews.title: "Easy on the eye and pocketbook"
reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with my purchase. I could kick myself for not buying more when it was on sale, but I was a little concerned because I had always purchased the large bags 3 cu ft pine bark mulch that Lowe's sells as well. Love the look and is easy to spread. One thing I have noticed that makes it a better purchase than the pink bark mulch...it seems that it blocks unwanted weeds to a greater degree. Probably because it is more of a shredded wood and is more compacted when spread out in my flower beds. It may break down (decompose) faster in the soil than the pine bark mulch...that could be a good or not so good thing considering each individual's need, but for me, it's a plus. As far as which is better nutrient wise when it starts to decompose in the soil, I have no clue. I'm no expert...just love to watch my garden grow :-) P.S. Just a little tip for those who may not be aware. Don't spread your mulch right up to the stem of your plants. Keep it away 2-3 inches to let the roots of the plant breath and allow it to soak up more water.
reviews.author: JILL

reviews.title: "Color very unattractive, looks faded already"
reviews.text: The bags were wet when I purchased the mulch and put it down. After it dried out for a couple of days the color was very pale and dull, not at all attractive. I would not recommend this mulch, pay a little more and get something that looks good.
reviews.author: Cindi

reviews.title: "Bad Mulch"
reviews.text: Color did not last a day! After some rain yesterday, the product was pale gray in the morning. I found a few insects in the mulch as I was tossing it from the bag to the flower bed as well, hope it doesn't cause an insect infestation in my garden.
reviews.author: Elia

reviews.title: "Color lasted one day"
reviews.text: Put mulch out on sunday, had rain the next day. The color was gone. No longer black have natural hard wood color now. Wait of time when we want to have black mulch to accent our yard and plants. POOR QUALITY. DO NOT BUY IF YOU WANT IT STAY BLACK.
reviews.author: CATSMEOW

reviews.title: "Good value"
reviews.text: I don't get the reviews complaining about the color washing out or the construction debris. I have been using this mulch for over 5 years and I have never had any of those issues. I always wait for the spring sale because it is such a good deal.
reviews.author: Ssd509

reviews.title: "Brown Hardwood Mulch is Great!"
reviews.text: We purchased 32 bags of this mulch and I just placed it over the last two days.  Every bag was great quality and the color is a deep brown which really highlights my landscape. In all the bags, I only found 3 very small pieces of plastic and that was no big deal to me. We also used this mulch several years ago, and no problems. When this product is on sale, stock up! Great value and I recommend it.
reviews.author: Dee

reviews.title: "Beware"
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I worked so hard on his yard, and we used this product in black. But, the second time we purchased "black" mulch it is dark brown!! So, now we have a two toned yard. We have to take this all up and try and purchase a better product, along with contacting the company. It's a waste of money, but worse, it's a terrible waste of your time. Not a super product if it's coming out of the bags different colors.
reviews.author: 1Cooper

reviews.title: "Great quality mulch"
reviews.text: Bought this to spruce up our flower beds and was very satisfied. The color of the mulch was great and really help the color of the flowers pop. The black color last for a while and does not fade quick. It also helps prevent weeds from growing.
reviews.author: Ali

reviews.title: "Good value and looks good"
reviews.text: Bagged mulch is so much easier to install than bulk mulch. This mulch looks great and is easy to install. I bought some last fall, and it still looks good. I bought a lot more this spring at the Black Friday prices. You can't beat the deal.
reviews.author: MJN1

reviews.title: "Not a a review"
reviews.text: Not a review on the product, but a review on the description.  "Premium Unit Of Measure Quantity Unit Of Measure Brown Hardwood Mulch".  C'mon, how's a layperson supposed to understand that when scrolling through products?  I'm sure it's fine mulch, but why don't you just say "Two cubic feet of mulch, $3 bucks", or something like that?  Geeze, life is short, way to over-complicate things.  :(
reviews.author: Zack1980

reviews.title: "Great Mulch!"
reviews.text: Used about 150 bags. Great consistency/quality. Sure it fades a little but it's black so a little fading is to be expected. Overall, it is easy to work with/spread and holds up very well. When it is on sale, it is even a better deal!!!!
reviews.author: kevbobbuck

reviews.title: "Expecting Better"
reviews.text: I bought this mulch on sale. Very poor quality product. Mulch had large pieces of rough bark, color was faded when opened and half of the bags were full of ants. When you add the treatment to kill the ants this mulch was not a bargain.
reviews.author: Doug

reviews.title: "Price explains quality"
reviews.text: Not the best mulch but you get that you pay for I guess. Did not see any termites, but did see rocks, bolts, screws, and very large sticks. Looks nice once laid down, unfortunately cannot recommend to anyone not on a strict budget.
reviews.author: wsandine

reviews.title: "Great mulch"
reviews.text: its great mulch and it is a fresh black in color. I do it once a year, anyone expecting a $3 bag of anything to hold its color for a super long term is a unreasonable person. its cheap and you have to do it twice a year. its easy.
reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: "Do Not Recommend"
reviews.text: I have used this mulch two times.  The color does not last longer than a few weeks.  Runs out of beds so easily when it rains and becomes a waste of money.  Scott's brand is much better even with the slight higher price.
reviews.author: bmbutler

reviews.title: "A-OK Brown Mulch"
reviews.text: 2nd year I have used this "Cheap" mulch. That is a total of 22 bags. It does a "good" job for the price. Have not run into any of the problems other people are complaining about. For $2.00 a bag I will buy it again.
reviews.author: Bob

reviews.title: "Poor Quality & fungus"
reviews.text: Only bought 5 bags in Kyle, TX.  Rained on once and much of the brown color washed off.  Also, the mulch smells like manure and the mulch contained quite a bit of white fungus.  Worst bagged mulch I've ever bought.
reviews.author: Charlie

reviews.title: "Don't waste your money!!"
reviews.text: Bought 10 bags half were brown and half were black. The chemical smell is atrocious. Faded after the first rain. Don't waste your hard earned money!From now on I am going to use shredded leaves and pine straw.
reviews.author: Me

reviews.title: "It's a mixed bag."
reviews.text: The wood is mostly reclaimed scrap wood. Meaning it's not forested farm trees, it's junk wood. I know this because I've have a few bags over the years that contained large chunks of particleboard, part of a 2 x 4, blue painted pieces, plastic. So I wouldn't use it around edible plants, but good enough for trees, shrubs, flowerbeds etc.
reviews.author: Yasha

reviews.title: "Quality dropped"
reviews.text: I have purchased this mulch and have been pleased in the past, however, the last bags I bought were terrible. They had less coloring than mulch that has been on the ground for over a year. Would not recommend.
reviews.author: LJ

reviews.text: Bought it on sale for $2 a bag. Good product for the price. Was a little worried reading some reviews, but all 50 of my bags turned out fine. Will return to review if color fades before the 12 month guarantee.
reviews.author: jcgoette

reviews.title: "12 mth color Guarantee? As long as it doesn't rain"
reviews.text: Had the mulch down for a week. Looked great till first rain fall. Watched the color right out. The old mulch I had down 12 months earlier from another brand now looks better then this. Very disappointed.
reviews.author: CarlSC

reviews.title: "BUYER BEWARE"
reviews.text: I  purchased 40 bags for my yard. Within a matter of two months of putting it down I have a mushrooms. I've had to pull all mulch up, scrap through the dirt and just put new black dirt out. Very upsetting!
reviews.author: MMM12349

reviews.title: "Very Good Quality Mulch"
reviews.text: I bought 50 bags of this mulch and it was all good quality.  I don't recall seeing large chunks of wood or stones in the mulch.  The brown color and shredd as consistent throughout all the bags.
reviews.author: B

reviews.title: "Large chunks of unground wood, poor coloring"
reviews.text: I bought this mulch last year and and it was decent, this I bought 200 bags and it is horrid, lots of trash, unground large chunks, the coloring is very poor, stay away from this garbage
reviews.author: Lanny

reviews.title: "Product description spot on and the color lasts!"
reviews.text: Like the label says, it is what it is and works and looks great. Caught it on sale and bought 75 bags. It was very convenient to buy on line and then go pick it up in batches - the store is 2 miles away. This is an excellent product and the color does not fade or silver like pine needles, nuggets, or other mulches - which saves me a whole lot of time not having to "turn" the mulch to refresh the color.
reviews.author: MikeG

reviews.title: "Brown Mulch"
reviews.text: I bought 24 bags a couple of weeks ago and found them to be great....no bugs at all.......in 24 bags I only found a couple of chunks......it was a great buy and my yard looks super!!!!!!!
reviews.author: D

reviews.title: "Awful awful Odor"
reviews.text: Three days later after applying three bags of the brown mulch in my borders...my yard (and the neighbors yard) smell like manure or some kind of toxic waste.  Do not purchade this mulch!!
reviews.author: Bungalow

reviews.title: "Great mulch for a great price"
reviews.text: I've been buying this mulch for almost 2 years now. Excellent quality and value. Color is consistent and hasn't faded in all the time I've been using it. Would highly recommend it.
reviews.author: Jill

reviews.title: "Good mulch"
reviews.text: Purchased the premium mulch for several years now, none of the issues stated in some reviews. I've had neighbors ask where I got the mulch, just laid 32 bags over 2weeks no issues
reviews.author: Bm

reviews.title: "Pretty Good"
reviews.text: I found that this is pretty stuff for the price, can't get much for $2.00 and I am happy because I live on a rented lot and don't want to spend a fortune for flower beds ........
reviews.author: debsvett

reviews.title: "Good"
reviews.text: Not sure why its getting such low ratings. We purchased 30 bags and looks great. Going back to get another 30 bags for the back yard. Love that it was on sale and inexpensive!
reviews.author: Santhe

reviews.title: "Mulch with Preen"
reviews.text: I purchased 30 bags of the black mulch with preen from Lowes... Half of the bags had visible preen pellets, the other half (15 bags) had no visible preen pellets. I purchased the product for the preen weed killer. I am concerned about the quality and do not feel I got the product feature I paid for. I tried to send an email to the customer service department of the manufacturer (customerservice@lebsea.com) but the email address is not working, emails were undeliverable.
reviews.author: Thad

reviews.title: "Mulch is Mulch"
reviews.text: My husband and I had been planning to shovel up the overgrown weeds, and 10+ year old River rock in front of our home for a while and recently began the process. With it being Mid Fall, I called several stores locally checking for brown mulch and one of the only places I could get it was Lowes. I placed an order for 15+ bags and picked them up over 2 trips as we only have a car. We both work and with it getting dark earlier and earlier, we work on the landscaping whenever we can, little by little. When we started the project I knew brown mulch would make the front of the house look so much nicer (especially compared to ridiculously overgrown weeds), and I couldn't be happier with the results. Now, I will say that this isn't the most expensive/high quality mulch that stores sell but mulch is mulch and it certainly does the job. As with most mulches, this mulch lost some of the darkness in the color after a few frosty mornings/rainy days, but it still looks fantastic! This mulch looks nice, and is affordable. If that doesn't sound good to you, I suggest getting a different brand! Otherwise, you cannot go wrong!
reviews.author: OvertheHillsRanch

reviews.title: "12 month color, guaranteed?"
reviews.text: Bought 2 or 3 bags. Color looked great out of the bag. No mold or trash. Color lasted a few days before being completely washed out. Looks like gray/brown wood shreds now
reviews.author: Tyler

reviews.title: "not 12 months"
reviews.text: I purchased 32 bags for f mulch. Took it in my car and got black stain all over my trunk. I spread the mulch. Then comes tbe rain and it is not black mulch it is now brown.
reviews.author: okok

reviews.title: "12 hour color guarantee?"
reviews.text: Bought 12 bags Labor Day weekend on sale, put down on Sunday and it rained that PM. The next day the color was the same dull black/grey as the mulch I put down last fall.
reviews.author: RichieG9999

reviews.text: Ran out of product before finishing project....re-ordered more on-line.....picked it up at store checkout.....back to work, finished the project all within 60 minutes.
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "Great Value when on sale"
reviews.text: Best value when it's on sale "premium"... Much better Quality than at HD.... I'll purchase again when it's on sale.. even at $3 it's not bad but $2 is much better.
reviews.author: J516GA

reviews.title: "Not sure about this product."
reviews.text: The bags of mulch I picked up were wet from rain. They bags smelled like manure. Not sure why, but not pleasant near the entry to our home. Hopefully this will dissipate soon. Thanks
reviews.author: BPB

reviews.title: "Bags fall apart"
reviews.text: The bags are so thin they almost fall apart when you pick them up. I went through 30 bags on a new pallet to get 5 ones that were not torn then I gave up.
reviews.author: paintbuyer

reviews.title: "colors vary"
reviews.text: Purchased 20 bags and the reds vary. Hoping over time the colors will blend and not be so obvious.I will know next time to check before having loaded.
reviews.author: geegee

reviews.title: "Premium Black Mulch"
reviews.text: This mulch does the job perfectly and makes the flower beds look great. Bought 30+ bags and all were of the same color and consistency. HIGHLY recommend.
reviews.author: ABAB

reviews.title: "Great for retaining moisture"
reviews.text: If you're looking for product that will help you cut down on the water use, this is it. Better yet, this product stays in place even when the winds blow.
reviews.author: VCFarmer

reviews.title: "Very satisfied"
reviews.text: I switched from my favorite mulch when i found this on sale. I am glad that I didn't read the reviews-I have been extremely happy with this mulch.
reviews.author: Jane

reviews.title: "Really nice"
reviews.text: Bought 10 bags to start.  Great color and pretty uniform sized. No mold, no rocks, no lumber, and no trash. Going back for more to finish up.
reviews.author: Seasons

reviews.title: "Quality"
reviews.text: this mulch does what its supposed to lasts a good summer season its good to add a little water to it every now and then if its a dry season
reviews.author: bobby

reviews.title: "Bob Likes Lowe's Mulch"
reviews.text: We use Lowe's Brown Mulch just about every time they put it on sale 4 x $10, which is about every holiday weekend. Keep that up for us, Lowe's!
reviews.author: BoggienGA

reviews.title: "Great Deal!!!"
reviews.text: Just bought 14 bags this morning despite the negative reviews and happy to report that all 14 bags were perfect.  Awesome Memorial Day sale.

reviews.title: "Great Value"
reviews.text: This product was a great value. Gave me the option to purchase just the right amount of mulch without having to worry about unused portions.

reviews.title: "Great mulch and great color"
reviews.text: This is a good mulch for the price they are asking at Lowe's.  Keeps color thru the summer and fall. I did not find any trash or garbage in mine so not sure what the other people are talking about? Mulch has to be made from something, either trees just cut down or from recycled wood like from pallets, etc. I rate this a 5 out of 5 for the good value on this mulch and color that stays.

reviews.title: "Stinkhorn Infested"
reviews.text: bought 5 bags of much for a flower bed. towards the end of summer we got this red fungus called stink horns. They grew back daily.
reviews.author: Tony

reviews.title: "Too many large chunks of scrap wood!"
reviews.text: I usually buy mulch in bulk from my local supplier of mulch, dirt, rock, etc. for my customers.  However, this customer only needed a small amount of mulch for two gardens which she added, so I bought 10 bags from Lowe's.  I was VERY disappointed when I applied this mulch.  The color is beautiful, but the chunks inside were embarrassing!  Many were 1" x 3", and there were many long (up to 8") split pieces of wood.  Lots of random chunks that I had to remove.  This may be okay under trees in a large bed, but it certainly was not acceptable in a flower garden.  Very disappointed.  I have had bagged mulch before (from Lowe's and other places), but this is the worst I have ever seen.  By the way - after I drove 10 miles from the Lowe's store to deliver it, I wasn't going to take it back and buy it somewhere else.  Time is money.  I know they would cheerfully accept the return, but they aren't going to reimburse me for wasted wages and mileage. Just for the record - I spend LOTS of money at Lowe's and am almost always very happy with everything I buy there.  They should definitely not buy from this supplier, or at least require them to improve the quality.
reviews.author: Kathy

reviews.title: "BANG FOR YOUR BUCK"

reviews.title: "My Preferred Mulch!"
reviews.text: I initially purchased this mulch because I was tired of shoveling bulk mulch from the back of my truck. Such exhausting work! On sale at $2.50 per bag, the Premier mulch was comparably priced to the bulk mulch I'd had delivered for years by the time I paid a $35 delivery fee. Having been disappointed by the quality and poor colorfastness of bagged mulch in the past, my expectations were low. Fortunately, they were exceeded! This mulch (and its color) lasted the guaranteed 12 months, which meant that when spring arrived this year, I could just "top off" previously mulched areas and beef up areas washed out by rain and scuffed out by our dogs. Also, because the mulch from the previous spring was still largely intact, the early spring weeds were dramatically reduced. Now I buy this mulch even if it's not on sale! (Though with having to buy about 75 bags, I do try to time my purchase for their spring sale!)
reviews.author: Debbie

reviews.title: "The bag doesn't mention anything about cow manure"

reviews.title: "Bad Spring conditions"
reviews.text: Great stuff, won't break down like your triple grounds do in 6 months.It is HARDWOOD mulch, not, hardwood flooring.It is a HORRIBLE spring!!!!!!! No long HOT drying days to set and cure the mulch.It will happen to ANY colored mulch. NEVER spread if you know it will rain within 24-48 hours.You may produced your terrible results.

reviews.title: "PREMIUM BLACK MULCH"
reviews.text: My husband and I bought 25 bags of black mulch yesterday 5/25/19. We noticed the bags smelled a little funny and the mulch was really wet.  We put the much down in the garden beds and the smell got stronger. It smells like cow manure.  Still smelled the following morning. We used it last year but no smell.  I did notice that last years mulch turned white under the hard layer.  Noticed it once I tried to rake it.  Not Happy!

reviews.title: "Looked good but dont recommend"
reviews.text: Most of the bags had been taped which didnt really bother me since they were on sale. However, bag three looks like its infested with termites. Bag 4 looks iffy. Taking back the other bags.
reviews.author: Linda

reviews.title: "Color Guaranteed until it Rains"
reviews.text: Huge huge disappointment. If you want to skip this narrative, just don't buy the product. Purchased 60 bags in Carmel, IN on a $2 per bag sale. I bought this after a competitor ran out of their $2 product, so it's not just a cheap-mulch issue. The mulch I put down 2 weeks ago from the competitor still looks awesome.In short, I'm taking the 18 bags I haven't put down back to Lowes, after seeing what last night's two-inch rainfall did to the color. The product is a *mostly pleasing deep dark brown when you first apply it, but it fades immediately in spite of the "12-month color guarantee". I'll be reapplying another product over what I already put down - it's so bad that its' hard to tell where I stopped applying. Last year's color and this product are now virtually the same.*My other issue goes to consistency of the product. Not only are there big enough chunks to use for kindling, there are blue and red colored pieces throughout, evidently from the pallets used to make it. It was manageable to pick those out and toss them aside, again because they were plenty big enough to identify. Frustration is not due to money - it's the effort in applying and the rework. Why would you put a product out there that you know is going to waste peoples' time?
reviews.author: taylorgs

reviews.title: "Bad Reviews?"
reviews.text: I do not understand the bad reviews for this mulch. We have found it to be perfectly adequate, well-priced and durable. We have not found any garbage mixed in, not insects, nor any undesireable substance. The plants that are banked with this product are flourishing - they were drying out before we put the mulch down.
reviews.author: Robin

reviews.title: "Price increase!!!"
reviews.text: This looks o.k. It does the job I wanted it to do. I do not like that they increased the price from $2.00/bag to $3.66/bag. With the poor ratings, you'd think they would have kept it at the $2.00 mark. I do not believe the $2.00 was a sale price either. Disappointed.

reviews.title: "Good mulch for the price"
reviews.text: I first bought this mulch in fall 2016. It lasted almost 18 months through two Northeast Ohio winters. The color faded to dark gray but was still OK. I re-did my flowerbeds this spring with this mulch again. I really like this mulch for the price. I found some "surprises" in many bags like pieces of black plastic bags, chunks of branches intact with bark or chunks of what looked like pallet wood, but those were not pervasive in any way.

reviews.title: "Color didn't last"
reviews.text: Luckily we only bought two bags to start with and only used one. We put it down on a Saturday and it rained that night. The next morning we found that the black color had all washed out and we were left with pathetic grey looking mulch. Do yourself a favor and don't waste your time or money on this mulch.

reviews.text: The mulch in the bag had a poor color. When it rained the color went away on a lot of the chunks. It also floated in the water and made big clumps in places. This is not a good product. I bought 20 bags and some of them had been split and re-taped together. Those bags were not full and I was not getting what I paid for. It's too far to drive to return the mulch as I live out of town and I just got stuck with some poor quality mulch.

reviews.text: I made the mistake of buying this cheap so called "Hardwood" mulch from Lowes last year and won't do it again.  Note it does not say "Hardwood" anywhere on the bag, but Lowe's advertises it as such on their website.  This stuff is just stained wood and contains big chunks of wooden pieces that will be there again next Spring.  Real hardwood mulch mostly disintegrates into the soil and won't be sitting there in another year.

reviews.text: Landscape yard quality at an unbeatable price. I purchased a total of 34 bags and saved a ton of money. I only wish I hadn't gone to the landscaper supply yard first and wasted my money on mulch there. Next time I need mulch, Lowes will be my first stop!
reviews.author: Tanner2

reviews.title: "Absolutely horrible!"
reviews.text:
We, too, smelled the product through holes in the bag. It smelled a bit like the damp wood at a local theme water park...sort of dank, but mostly like a combination of mild dye smell and cedar.

The bags had many holes and it had rained recently. The employees were very nice and loaded them into the back of the tan interior minivan, offering sheet plastic to protect the bed of the vehicle before loading.

Oh, my! What a mess!!! We arrived home and found the brown dye had splattered half way up the side of the rear interior walls while it had been loaded. It was pooling and running under the plastic. Thankfully, we had left a thick protective blanket in place before the employee added the plastic, and the blanket absorbed most of the dye before it soaked through, as our travels were short in length. As we pulled the bags out of the vehicle, the dye got all over our arms and (work) clothes. It is a good thing we were dressed in work clothes to purchase the mulch, because the dye was running everywhere so quickly, we would have been hard pressed for time to go change, once we discovered all the problems! The vehicle smelled very strongly of dye at this point. It was all just an awful situation!

We stacked the bags on the grass, realizing the stain would probably stain the concrete driveway. We had to remove the plastic carefully, so that the rivulets of watery dye would not further seep under the poor attempt at protection. We then had to mop up the escaped dye with rolls of paper towels. Then, we had to wash and rewash all the interior surfaces and launder the old blanket. At this point, we wished we had not purchased this mulch, but return transportation became an apparent problem, and we were under a time constraint to apply the mulch.

If we thought the mulch transport was bad, we obviously had not applied the mulch, yet. We were COVERED in wet, smelly dye. It soaked through rubber overlay fabric gloves, soaked into our clothing, stained our arms and legs, and stained under our fingernails, which took two days to finally wash out the dye with repeated nail scrubs. It even slightly stained the shower surface, when we bathed at the end of the day, so now we had to clean the dye out of the shower! 

The dye smelled awful, straight out of the bag, but dissipated fairly quickly. It stained the sidewalks and concrete everywhere we accidentally dropped it while applying it. (Those stains did wash off, but what a pain to have to stop and wash it as we went!) It stained the bottom of our shoes as we treaded lightly through larger beds, then tracked that onto the concrete and any surfaces on which we walked. We had to remove our shoes to enter the house for amenities during the course of our work, but our hands were so nasty, they got stain on the shoes and outdoor water faucets and tools. 

Of greatest concern is the now apparent realization that all this really offensive dye is going to leach into the ground around our house, into the water table, and, ultimately, possibly affect our family/pets/wildlife on a negative chemical scale. Of second concern is whether or not this dye is going to splash out onto the cement surfaces during rains. Our third concern is that the family/pets will not be able to step into the flowerbeds without tracking the damp or wet dye (or dry dye transferred from wet feet) onto the cement surfaces/interior house floors. Fourth concern is wondering what chemicals our bodies were exposed to while applying the mulch. And on a worldly, environmental scale, we are sorry we contributed to degradation of the natural environment caused by the production of massive volumes of this fake "natural" covering. 

The mulch did not contain foreign debris, but we were a bit disappointed at how long and large some of the pieces were. Some were the size and shape of lasagna noodles!

We will not buy this, or any other, dyed mulch product again, and we will discourage others from purchasing it, as well.
reviews.author: kayyak

reviews.title: "Premium Mulch Eeh"

reviews.title: "Brown Mulch"
reviews.text: Good thing it was on sale. Very heavy bags due to mulch being so wet. It was like mud. Lots of rock and debris.
reviews.author: Terrygolfs

reviews.title: "looks good to me."
reviews.text: put down 35 bags yesterday. did find 2 rocks, but so what. more like compost but will see how it goes...
reviews.author: ee

reviews.title: "Terrible Mulch"
reviews.text: The bags of mulch I purchased were more like bags of sticks instead of mulch.  Might be OK for spreading around trees or large shrubs, but the chunks were too large around my flower beds.
reviews.author: Cathy

reviews.title: "Poor Quality-Contains Plastic and Foreign Objects"
reviews.text: Besides chunks of wood black mulch contained plastic and even a sprayer for a hose,stained black. Initially I assumed it has been from the ground,but noted it coming from the bags. Scary.
reviews.author: Jimnjcil

reviews.title: "Smells like ammonia"
reviews.text: We purchased the Black Premium Mulch and it has a terrible smell like ammonia. It has been in the flower bed for 4 days and smell is very strong and not dissipating. Read up on it and that means they were bagged for so long not breathing they grow mold and creates smell. DO NOT BUY THIS IF IT SMELLS. Guests and neighbor can smell it. Some of the mulch even has green mold on it.
reviews.author: Tony

reviews.title: "Black Mulch"
reviews.text: The reason I gave a con to this review is that this product isn't on sale enough times during the year. Other than that, it is a good product to use. I have had no issues with it.
reviews.author: frimar

reviews.title: "mulch contains mold/fungus"
reviews.text: I have bought this mulch in the past, and purchased 35 bags this year during a sale. In a prior year, I recall getting a very bizarre yellow/orange mold during the summer (fuligo septica - aka dog vomit mold), but did not (at the time) identify the mulch as the source. This year, not only do I see some yellow/orange spores which appear to be the beginning of fuligo septica, but almost every bag has a whitish mold in about 5-20% of the total volume in the bag. In some places, the mold is so advanced that the mulch is densely clumping together and it's difficult to break up. When you put white mold in black mulch, the result is less than stellar - it barely looks like we added new mulch! Very disappointed, and I should have taken the bags back right away. I did not think it would be as bad as it really was, and frankly did not want the hassle of returning 35 bags. I will not be buying this brand of mulch again.
reviews.author: Disappointed-Gardener

reviews.title: "OK Mulch but I wouldn't consider it "Premium""
reviews.text: Last year I bought triple ground loose brown mulch from a local landscape supply.  I bought six yards which I picked up with my trailer.  Since Lowe's puts their sale price down to $2.00 per bag, that price on a per yard basis was somewhat cheaper then the landscape supply.  So I decided to give it a try since it looked OK in the bags and was "premium" mulch.  At 2 cu. ft. per bag, that's 13.5 bags per yard so I bought 80 bags (13.5 x 6 yds = 81).Handling the bags was no issue.  I could put three bags in my wheel barrow which would have been about the same amount if I had shoveled it loose.  As I started spreading the mulch, I was surprised and disappointed by two things about the mulch.  First of all, the consistency varied from bag to bag.  Some bags seemed to be ground pretty fine while others had fairly large chunks of un-ground wood.  Some of the chunks were as big as 1.5 inches in diameter and 3 inches long.  At best, I would consider this mulch to be "double" ground but with a premium designation I'd have expected it to be "triple" ground.Second, I found the color consistency to be very poor.  I picked up the bags in groups of 20 to 40 at a time.  Each time the bags were pulled from the same pallet.  However, the color of the mulch varied quite a bit.  Most bags were deep brown, but about every 3rd or 4th bag, I'd get one that was a redish brown color.  The difference is very noticeable.  One afternoon my wife came out and asked if I got the mulch from two different places because the color difference was so noticeable.Also, when I was about half done, I soon realized that 80 bags wasn't going to make it.  As such, I had to buy another 20 more bags.  Turns out that the landscape supply loads the loose mulch with a bucket loader.  Most often the bucket is one yard but they often are heaping buckets.  So you are typically getting about one and a quarter yards for each bucket.  So the 6 yards I got last year was probably more like 7.5 yards which is why I had to buy the extra 20 bags.Needless to say I won't be buying this mulch again next year.  I'll be going back to the landscape supply where the consistency of the color and grind are much better.
reviews.author: hammerboy4522

reviews.title: "Stains Concrete"
reviews.text: The dye used to color the mulch will stain concrete ... badly! DO NOT set any bag on concrete or stone walkways without first placing down a plastic tarp or another plastic covering to contain any bag leakage. The product bags are not completely sealed and the color dye will leak out onto the adjoining surface. Then your problems really begin. The mulch does its job however.
reviews.author: Spauthy

reviews.text: Bought 70 bags of this mulch and all of the bags were the same shade. I bought the bags on sale because it was easy to handle, and on sale it is cheaper then the bulk.
reviews.author: LCS

reviews.title: "Very Unhappy"
reviews.text: Very poor color.  Looks like it was down for 6 months after 1 week.  Never never again.  Also had numerous large chunks.  Save your money.
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "Got these at a great sale price!"
reviews.text: I bought 15 of these at 5 bags for $10! I am so glad I did! However, I don't recommend purchasing these after a rainstorm! Some of my bags were pretty wet and hence, some of the black ink ran off onto my car seats! Not only that but, when these bags get wet, they're extremely heavy to move!Now I have to find more $$$ to get my car's interior cleaned out...
reviews.author: Candi212

reviews.title: "Beware -- stunts the growth of your plants"
reviews.text: I usually buy Black Medallion at Lowes.  Last spring (2017) I bought about 80 bags of this mulch.  I had it spread around my vegetable and flower plants.  They didn't get very big, so I am guessing there was something in this mulch, since I never had this problem with Black Medallion.  I bought this because it was a dollar cheaper, but I won't do this again.
reviews.author: JosephineLawrence

reviews.title: "Weaverville, NC"
reviews.text: Love the black! Made a world of difference in my flower beds!
reviews.author: LG

reviews.title: "Thanks for the roaches!"
reviews.text: Bought 20 bags of Brown mulch a month ago to make a flower bed beside the house It does look good but now we have roaches! Never had roaches before but now we do. So use at your own risk.
reviews.author: Joe

reviews.title: "Very poor quality"
reviews.text: I purchased several bags of this product last year. When opened the bags found it to be more dirt than mulch. A year later can't even tell mulch was applied to areas that had approx. 4" of mulch/dirt put on it last year. Very strongly don't recommend this product. Spend a little extra to get quality and save in the long run
reviews.author: Dk

reviews.text: Great mulch and the black really last. Adds a great contrast to any landscaping. It's expensive when you need a lot of it, i wished there was a discount for bulk purchases.
reviews.author: Soisauce

reviews.title: "Mixed thoughts"
reviews.text: Picked up 15 bags of this mulch on Sale for $2.00. Got it all spread in one evening. After finishing up I was ate up with bug bites. I had just weeded the flower beds so I know the bugs weren't there. The color is nice and rich but have a problems with so many bugs in it. Also several huge clumps of dirt were in the bags.
reviews.author: Sunshine

reviews.title: "Mine is still brown after Summer of constant Rain"
reviews.text: Great value for price. I snagged mine for 2 dollars a bag and used a coupon code for buying a lot of it for over $100.   Mine is still brown after a summer of rain.  Easier than unloading a truck load full of wood chips from the city recycle.
reviews.author: SusanR

reviews.title: "Last batch was full of ticks!"
reviews.text: I've bought A LOT of this mulch over the last couple of summers...probably close to 60 bags. I redid all the landscaping around my house so I was starting from scratch. If you purchase these on sale, Lowe's puts them on sale several times a year, you can get them for $2 a bag. However, the last 10 bags I purchased this spring were full of ticks. I didn't notice them at first. I left the bags sitting in my pickup truck for a couple of weeks in my garage. Then after unloading them one day, I found a tick on me that evening. Since I've NEVER seen a single tick or flea in my yard, house or on any of my pets in the 20 years I've lived here, I couldn't figure out where it came from. Then I remembered unloading the mulch. The next morning I went out to inspect the bags and there were ticks crawling around on the inside as well as the outside in the seams of the bags and there were also a few in my truck bed. This is the first time I've seen any sort of insect in this mulch, and like I said... I've bought a lot of this stuff! Don't know where these last 10 bags came from but previous reviews have mentioned spider mites and termites so the manufacturer needs a heads-up on pest control in their facility. I've always liked this mulch. It's a great color and stays where you put it.
reviews.author: Baybrat

reviews.title: "Terrible mulch"
reviews.text: Really terrible.  I bought 6 bags to test it out after reading a number of mixed reviews.  No bug issues or foreign objects as some found, but the color was washed away. Less than 1 week and I couldn't tell where I put down new mulch.  Others have had good luck with the black and red but stay away from the brown.
reviews.author: Drew

reviews.title: "Not as good quality as last year!"
reviews.text: I recently bought a total of 36 bags of this mulch, needless to say I have plenty of kindling for the camp fire this year! Had to pick out so many large chunks that were never mulched. Luck y I bought all the bags on sale, not worth the current price of $3.33 a bag for all the large chunks I had to pick out!!
reviews.author: Reggie

reviews.title: "STINKY Mulch!!"
reviews.text: OMG...So, I put this nice black mulch down last evening and today?  IT STINKS LIKE A HORSE BARN!!!  I went around to my neighbors and apologized, because I am NOT pulling it all back up for that!  But still, I would think those packaging it could/would be able to tell it smells like manure!!!!  Blecccchhhhh.
reviews.author: OhioGal

reviews.title: "mulch"
reviews.text: Dark stained mulch doesn't match old natural mulch, so more is needed to cover the old mulch.  It smells like animal excrement.
reviews.author: Tom

reviews.title: "CAUTION ALLERGIC REACTION!!!!"
reviews.text: Great looking mulch BUT bags were mismarked as to color. All were marked brown but had black mulch inside. ALLERGEN. we could hardly breath in the car and the attack kept coming so we ended up returning  the bags and bought natural cedar. I think the allergen is the color dye.
reviews.author: Mauwehu

reviews.title: "Premium Dark Brown Hardwood Mulch"
reviews.text: We purchased 45 bags of this mulch and the color is consistent throughout. Looks very good in the garden and works well keeping in the moisture. Did not float away during a recent very strong thunderstorm, which sometimes happens with other mulch. Very happy with purchase.
reviews.author: Rosie

reviews.title: "Mulch content?"
reviews.text: I purchased 15 bags of this mulch last week and five of the bags were put on my back seat.  By the time I got home (approx 20 min), my face and throat were covered with hives.  I would like to know what chemicals are in this mulch to cause a severe allergic reaction.
reviews.author: Jane

reviews.title: "Contains all necessary nutrients"
reviews.text: Contains all necessary nutrients to maintain termite and carpenter ant health.  Be sure to use lots around all your plantings and especially foundation plants.
reviews.author: clamsteam

reviews.title: "Great mulch for garden design"
reviews.text: I have started using colored mulch to enhance the look of my garden. With the red, brown, black, and natural combinations you are able to create a great effect with the types of plants used. This product is very easy to use and the mulch is very even in size.
reviews.author: BobbbyT

reviews.title: "Good the first week"
reviews.text: I laid this over some prior mulch that was thinning in some areas.  Within a couple rains the mulch started to fade in color and No longer blended in to the real premium mulch from the year prior.  2 months later now it's really showing its wear.
reviews.author: DaWyzeGuy

reviews.title: "No problems"
reviews.text: On sale for $2.00 per bag.  Bought 39 bags and it was fine.  No mold or trash.  Maybe I was lucky, but didn't have the problems of others.  It does tend to be more black than brown, but I'm fine with it.  Can't expect the world for $2.00 per bag.
reviews.author: bill3965

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.

reviews.title: "Great value"
reviews.text: the yard guys were awesome. I purchased ahead of time via internet and when I got there my mulch was already bundled and wrapped, ready to load. Very nice! When this stuff is on sale it is an excellent value. Can't beat 5 for $10!
reviews.author: Coach

reviews.title: "A very good product"
reviews.text: I put 45 bags of this mulch in my flower beds in the fall. Seven months later it looks great. There was no debris in the mulch and it held its color over time. I'll definitely use this mulch in the future.

reviews.title: "Wouldn't consider this mulch"
reviews.text: Purchased item because I wanted mulch to cover the open areas in my garden. The "chips" are huge. Some at least 4" in length. The color lasted, but would never purchase this item again due to size of bark.
reviews.author: Wishihadntpurchasedit

reviews.title: "Different than last year"
reviews.text: Bought 10 bags last year, it was a very coarse cut. Bought 10 bags yesterday and it was a very fine cut. Not sure why there was such a major difference. The fine cut was what I was looking for.
reviews.author: Papapbob

reviews.title: "Color Left Almost Immediately"
reviews.text: I bought 25 bags during the Memorial day sale 2019. I started mulching that weekend. Today is June 1, doesnt even look like the same mulch. Dont waste your money. I tried to upload pics
reviews.author: Susan

reviews.title: "Good product"
reviews.text: Not sure where all these bad reviewers mulch came from but the 30 bags I got in Texas look fine. Very little foreign material. For $2 it's just fine. 2nd year I've used it.
reviews.author: Terpen

reviews.title: "Black mulch"
reviews.text: I was in the market for black mulch. As soon as Lowes had it on sale for 5 for $10, I purchased 68 bags (full pallet) and had Lowes deliver it to my house.
reviews.author: kenc

reviews.title: "Brown vs Black"
reviews.text: Someone should check the eyesight of the person that says this is brown. NOT!!!!  I have bought several bags over 5 or 6 trips.  All black.  Hope it fades.
reviews.author: Chuck

reviews.title: "Great Product (TRUST ME)"
reviews.text: I was so tired of reading negative reviews about this product that I made an account. I have bought 105 bags, so far this year and have found no metal, no plastic, etc. Yes in the bag it is a richer black, but only because its so moist. I see no additional color variation after the initial 10 minute drying period then I have 2 months after hard Western PA rains. Yes, your hands will be black from spreading it, but the product is damp in the bags. I have had zero mold in any of my bags either. The sizes are all quite uniform and I have not had any 8 inch pieces, etc. Locally, they want 210 bucks for 5 yards of mulch delivered from the local landscape company. I moved all 105 bags in a car over a course of multiple trips. I bought roughly 7.5 yards of mulch for the same price of buying 5 yards from a non box store. There is an aroma for the first day or so, but it quickly dissipates. This is a great product especially when you need yards of it at a reasonable cost. My house was a foreclosure, so it hadn't been mulched in over 5 years. I am very pleased with this product and will likely buy it again next year when it is on sale 5 for 10.
reviews.author: HOSTA-ADDICT

reviews.title: "Color guarantee .. not so"
reviews.text: We've purchased quite s few bags and spread in areas with sun and shade hardly no rain and within couple weeks color very dull. Disappointed
reviews.author: Patti

reviews.title: "Great product for the price"
reviews.text: This is second year in a row I bought this mulch and it works well. It retains black color and don't have any smell. Easy to spread too.

reviews.title: "As Expected"
reviews.text: I purchased this product a little over a year ago and I'm about to go out on Friday morning and get 30 more bags. Need I say more?!?!

reviews.text: We bought 35 bags some days ago. When using it most bags had a large part of mulch which was white. Seems to be moldy. Bad quality!

reviews.text: I needed to get rid of the pine straw in my landscaping and replaced it with the mulch. I love it. It is beautiful.
